Emperor Thaurissan.name: Emperor Thaurissan
Emperor Thaurissan.flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.

Lightspawn.name: Lightspawn
Lightspawn.flavor: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

Doomcaller.name: Doomcaller
Doomcaller.flavor: "Hello, is Doom there? No? Can I leave a message?"

Zoobot.name: Zoobot
Zoobot.flavor: The Murloc is taking the picture.

Salty Dog.name: Salty Dog
Salty Dog.flavor: He's recently recovered from being a "scurvy dog."

Eaglehorn Bow.name: Eaglehorn Bow
Eaglehorn Bow.flavor: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

Blood Imp.name: Blood Imp
Blood Imp.flavor: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

Auchenai Soulpriest.name: Auchenai Soulpriest
Auchenai Soulpriest.flavor: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

Tinker's Sharpsword Oil.name: Tinker's Sharpsword Oil
Tinker's Sharpsword Oil.flavor: "Get ready to strike oil!" - Super-cheesy battle cry

Forlorn Stalker.name: Forlorn Stalker
Forlorn Stalker.flavor: He's going to leave the dying up to you, if that's cool.

Deathwing, Dragonlord.name: Deathwing, Dragonlord
Deathwing, Dragonlord.flavor: To his credit, Deathwing really took to heart the feedback he was receiving that he needed to be "more of a team player".

Blood Knight.name: Blood Knight
Blood Knight.flavor: The Blood Knights get their holy powers from the Sunwell, which you should NOT bathe in.

Explosive Shot.name: Explosive Shot
Explosive Shot.flavor: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

Lightning Storm.name: Lightning Storm
Lightning Storm.flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

Amani Berserker.name: Amani Berserker
Amani Berserker.flavor: If an Amani berserker asks "Joo lookin' at me?!", the correct response is "Nah, mon".

Dragonling Mechanic.name: Dragonling Mechanic
Dragonling Mechanic.flavor: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

Reliquary Seeker.name: Reliquary Seeker
Reliquary Seeker.flavor: The Reliquary considers itself the equal of the League of Explorers.  The League of Explorers doesn't.

Light's Champion.name: Light's Champion
Light's Champion.flavor: When there's something strange (say, a gibbering demon) in your neighborhood, who are you going to call?

Finja, the Flying Star.name: Finja, the Flying Star
Finja, the Flying Star.flavor: The last true master of Finjitsu.

Stormpike Commando.name: Stormpike Commando
Stormpike Commando.flavor: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts.  They also bake a mean cupcake.

Silver Hand Regent.name: Silver Hand Regent
Silver Hand Regent.flavor: The Silver Hand is the best paladin organization.  The Argent Crusaders are super jealous.

Selfless Hero.name: Selfless Hero
Selfless Hero.flavor: "Don't worry about me… I'll just be here... under these tentacles."

Moat Lurker.name: Moat Lurker
Moat Lurker.flavor: He really enjoys lurking and gets a lot of job satisfaction out of it.

Shaku, the Collector.name: Shaku, the Collector
Shaku, the Collector.flavor: Aya even staged an intervention once, but Shaku still insists that he is not a hoarder.

The Curator.name: The Curator
The Curator.flavor: The Curator guards Azeroth’s deadliest creatures, but it’s secretly terrified of squirrels.

Shattered Sun Cleric.name: Shattered Sun Cleric
Shattered Sun Cleric.flavor: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink™!

The Beast.name: The Beast
The Beast.flavor: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.

Goblin Blastmage.name: Goblin Blastmage
Goblin Blastmage.flavor: If you can't find a bomb to throw, just pick up any goblin invention and throw that.

Grimscale Chum.name: Grimscale Chum
Grimscale Chum.flavor: Listen, see?  We'll take 'em to the docks, see?  And throw 'em in the sea, see?

Unlicensed Apothecary.name: Unlicensed Apothecary
Unlicensed Apothecary.flavor: Get the ingredients wrong on ONE healing potion and they take your license. What a world!

Murloc Warleader.name: Murloc Warleader
Murloc Warleader.flavor: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound?  Nope!  Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

Shadowform.name: Shadowform
Shadowform.flavor: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

Ethereal Conjurer.name: Ethereal Conjurer
Ethereal Conjurer.flavor: Despite the name, he's a solid conjurer.

Volcanic Drake.name: Volcanic Drake
Volcanic Drake.flavor: Volcanic Drakes breathe lava instead of fire. The antacid vendor at Thorium Point does a brisk business with them.

Jungle Panther.name: Jungle Panther
Jungle Panther.flavor: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

Pit Snake.name: Pit Snake
Pit Snake.flavor: It could be worse.  It could be a Snake Pit.

Demonheart.name: Demonheart
Demonheart.flavor: Virtually every member of the pro demon lobby is a warlock. Weird.

Bloodsail Corsair.name: Bloodsail Corsair
Bloodsail Corsair.flavor: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers.  It's called the "Pirate's Code".

Faceless Manipulator.name: Faceless Manipulator
Faceless Manipulator.flavor: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

Competitive Spirit.name: Competitive Spirit
Competitive Spirit.flavor: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself.  Or kill all the competitors.

Houndmaster.name: Houndmaster
Houndmaster.flavor: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

Blizzard.name: Blizzard
Blizzard.flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

Mirror Image.name: Mirror Image
Mirror Image.flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

Thistle Tea.name: Thistle Tea
Thistle Tea.flavor: Aren't Thistles prickly?  Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.

Booty Bay Bodyguard.name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
Booty Bay Bodyguard.flavor: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

Druid of the Saber.name: Druid of the Saber
Druid of the Saber.flavor: That's saberTEETH, not like curved pirate blades.  That's a different kind of druid.  Druid of the Curved Pirate Blades.

Journey Below.name: Journey Below
Journey Below.flavor: Don't stop believing there's something below.

Arcane Explosion.name: Arcane Explosion
Arcane Explosion.flavor: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

Holy Smite.name: Holy Smite
Holy Smite.flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

DOOM!.name: DOOM!
DOOM!.flavor: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

Mire Keeper.name: Mire Keeper
Mire Keeper.flavor:
"Hey.... Is that Mire for sale?"
"No.  I'm keeping it."

Gormok the Impaler.name: Gormok the Impaler
Gormok the Impaler.flavor: Gormok has been giving impaling lessons in a small tent near the tournament grounds.  For only 25g you too could learn the fine art of impaling!

Knuckles.name: Knuckles
Knuckles.flavor: When confronted with accusations of performance-enhancing bananas, Knuckles replied, "I get my fruit from trees I knock down with my bare hands like everyone else."

Djinni of Zephyrs.name: Djinni of Zephyrs
Djinni of Zephyrs.flavor: If you want your wish granted, don't rub him the wrong way.

Holy Light.name: Holy Light
Holy Light.flavor: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

Water Elemental.name: Water Elemental
Water Elemental.flavor: Don't summon a water elemental at a party.  It'll dampen the mood.

Meanstreet Marshal.name: Meanstreet Marshal
Meanstreet Marshal.flavor: Remember, submit your bribes directly to the Marshal - it's the law!

Ironforge Portal.name: Ironforge Portal
Ironforge Portal.flavor: Come to beautiful Ironforge! Where irons are forged and the forges are iron!

Armorsmith.name: Armorsmith
Armorsmith.flavor: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

Master of Evolution.name: Master of Evolution
Master of Evolution.flavor: Will be really useful in the new "Hearthémon" game.

Lightwarden.name: Lightwarden
Lightwarden.flavor: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

Inner Fire.name: Inner Fire
Inner Fire.flavor: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

Crazed Worshipper.name: Crazed Worshipper
Crazed Worshipper.flavor: Every month they share a pancake breakfast with the Perfectly Rational Worshippers.

Mini-Mage.name: Mini-Mage
Mini-Mage.flavor: He is sometimes found hiding in the treasure chest in the Gurubashi Arena.

Warsong Commander.name: Warsong Commander
Warsong Commander.flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

Silent Knight.name: Silent Knight
Silent Knight.flavor: He used to be a librarian.  Old habits die hard.

Windfury Harpy.name: Windfury Harpy
Windfury Harpy.flavor: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

Burly Rockjaw Trogg.name: Burly Rockjaw Trogg
Burly Rockjaw Trogg.flavor: He's burly because he does CrossFit.

Arcane Missiles.name: Arcane Missiles
Arcane Missiles.flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

Fireguard Destroyer.name: Fireguard Destroyer
Fireguard Destroyer.flavor: Ragnaros interviews hundreds of Fire Elementals for the position of "Destroyer" but very few have what it takes.

Book Wyrm.name: Book Wyrm
Book Wyrm.flavor: His favorites are classic tragedies like "The Hobbit" and "Grendel".

Volcanic Lumberer.name: Volcanic Lumberer
Volcanic Lumberer.flavor: The roots, the roots, the roots is on fire!

Rallying Blade.name: Rallying Blade
Rallying Blade.flavor: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.

Arcane Anomaly.name: Arcane Anomaly
Arcane Anomaly.flavor: He used to get work as a Spatial Anomaly, but he got tired of having his polarity reversed.

Shadowbomber.name: Shadowbomber
Shadowbomber.flavor: Shadowbomber does her job, but she's kind of phoning it in at this point.

Dark Iron Dwarf.name: Dark Iron Dwarf
Dark Iron Dwarf.flavor: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore.  Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

Astral Communion.name: Astral Communion
Astral Communion.flavor: Hey!  Moon!  Can I have some mana crystals?

Anubisath Sentinel.name: Anubisath Sentinel
Anubisath Sentinel.flavor: He's actually a 1/1 who picked up the hammer from the last guy.

Shade of Naxxramas.name: Shade of Naxxramas
Shade of Naxxramas.flavor: The Shades of Naxxramas hate the living. They even have a slur they use to refer them: Livers.

Addled Grizzly.name: Addled Grizzly
Addled Grizzly.flavor: Druids who spend too long in bear form are more susceptible to the whispers of the Old Gods.  Right now they are whispering the lyrics to "La Bamba".

Luckydo Buccaneer.name: Luckydo Buccaneer
Luckydo Buccaneer.flavor: You can't just leave a Luckydo somewhere.  You gotta keep 'em with you!  Especially in Gadgetzan!

Nerub'ar Weblord.name: Nerub'ar Weblord
Nerub'ar Weblord.flavor: Weblords spend all day making giant trampoline parks.

Argent Protector.name: Argent Protector
Argent Protector.flavor: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs.  I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

Mad Bomber.name: Mad Bomber
Mad Bomber.flavor: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

Felfire Potion.name: Felfire Potion
Felfire Potion.flavor: Kazakus has a squad of imps bottling Felfire round-the-clock and he *still* can't keep up with demand.

Clockwork Knight.name: Clockwork Knight
Clockwork Knight.flavor: It takes a lot to wind him up.

Hogger, Doom of Elwynn.name: Hogger, Doom of Elwynn
Hogger, Doom of Elwynn.flavor: When C'thun went to sleep, he checked under his bed for Hogger.

Equality.name: Equality
Equality.flavor: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

Twilight Elder.name: Twilight Elder
Twilight Elder.flavor: Just doesn't understand those Twilight Youngsters any more - with their comic books and their rock music.

Spectral Knight.name: Spectral Knight
Spectral Knight.flavor: What do Faerie Dragons and Spectral Knights have in common?  They both love pasta!

Timber Wolf.name: Timber Wolf
Timber Wolf.flavor: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

Garrison Commander.name: Garrison Commander
Garrison Commander.flavor: He'll never admit it, but he pushes you hard because he really cares about you.

Blade Flurry.name: Blade Flurry
Blade Flurry.flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

Rend Blackhand.name: Rend Blackhand
Rend Blackhand.flavor: Rend believes he is the True Warchief of the Horde and he keeps editing the wikipedia page for "Warchief of the Horde" to include his picture.

Resurrect.name: Resurrect
Resurrect.flavor: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: "rez plz"

Wildwalker.name: Wildwalker
Wildwalker.flavor: She was born to be something.  She is just not quite sure what yet...

Novice Engineer.name: Novice Engineer
Novice Engineer.flavor: "Half of this class will not graduate… since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

Gang Up.name: Gang Up
Gang Up.flavor: If you are thinking about visiting Moonbrook, you better roll deep.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.flavor: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

Steward of Darkshire.name: Steward of Darkshire
Steward of Darkshire.flavor: Turns out divine shields are way cheaper if you buy in bulk.

Counterfeit Coin.name: Counterfeit Coin
Counterfeit Coin.flavor: There is something funny about this coin… can't quite put my finger on it…

Unstable Portal.name: Unstable Portal
Unstable Portal.flavor: The denizens of Azeroth have no idea how much work goes into stabilizing portals.  We spend like 30% of GDP on portal upkeep.

Silence.name: Silence
Silence.flavor: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

Museum Curator.name: Museum Curator
Museum Curator.flavor: He is forever cursing the kids who climb on the rails and the evil archeologists who animate the exhibits.

Mogu'shan Warden.name: Mogu'shan Warden
Mogu'shan Warden.flavor: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King.   BOOOORRRINNG!

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

Trogg Beastrager.name: Trogg Beastrager
Trogg Beastrager.flavor: Still angry that the Gadgetzan Rager Club wouldn't accept him as a member.

Freezing Trap.name: Freezing Trap
Freezing Trap.flavor: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

Freezing Potion.name: Freezing Potion
Freezing Potion.flavor: This is delicious! Oh no. BRAIN FREEEEEEEZE!

Defender of Argus.name: Defender of Argus
Defender of Argus.flavor: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending.  But it does.

The Boogeymonster.name: The Boogeymonster
The Boogeymonster.flavor: Has 20 years of training in classical ballet, but ALLLLLL he ever gets asked to do is boogie.

Echo of Medivh.name: Echo of Medivh
Echo of Medivh.flavor: Medivh's echo haunts Karazhan, eternally cheating at chess and Hearthstone.

Hand of Protection.name: Hand of Protection
Hand of Protection.flavor: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

Dreadscale.name: Dreadscale
Dreadscale.flavor: Let's be clear about this:  ACIDMAW is the sidekick.

Thrallmar Farseer.name: Thrallmar Farseer
Thrallmar Farseer.flavor: He's stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he's hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

Reincarnate.name: Reincarnate
Reincarnate.flavor: It's like birth, except you're an adult and you were just dead a second ago.

Dark Arakkoa.name: Dark Arakkoa
Dark Arakkoa.flavor: There's a whole gradient of Arakkoa! This one is on the darker side.

Street Trickster.name: Street Trickster
Street Trickster.flavor: His first trick: making your wallet disappear!

Acidmaw.name: Acidmaw
Acidmaw.flavor: With the help of his trusty sidekick Dreadscale, the giant jormungar Acidmaw is ready to face any knight!

Worgen Infiltrator.name: Worgen Infiltrator
Worgen Infiltrator.flavor: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

Screwjank Clunker.name: Screwjank Clunker
Screwjank Clunker.flavor: If it breaks, just kick it a couple of times while yelling "Durn thing!"

Spider Tank.name: Spider Tank
Spider Tank.flavor: "What if we put guns on it?" -Fizzblitz, staring at the spider-transportation-machine

Ogre Ninja.name: Ogre Ninja
Ogre Ninja.flavor: He didn't have the grades to get into ninja school, but his dad pulled some strings.

Ancient Watcher.name: Ancient Watcher
Ancient Watcher.flavor: Why do its eyes seem to follow you as you walk by?

Assassin's Blade.name: Assassin's Blade
Assassin's Blade.flavor: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

Grimestreet Smuggler.name: Grimestreet Smuggler
Grimestreet Smuggler.flavor: She's got anything you want.  Need the latest derpinger?  No problem!

Mind Vision.name: Mind Vision
Mind Vision.flavor: I see what you did there.

Poisoned Blade.name: Poisoned Blade
Poisoned Blade.flavor: How much more poisoned can a blade get?  The answer is a lot.  A lot more poisoned.

Ship's Cannon.name: Ship's Cannon
Ship's Cannon.flavor: If you hear someone yell, "Cannonball!" you're about to get wet. Or crushed.

Baron Geddon.name: Baron Geddon
Baron Geddon.flavor: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

Arathi Weaponsmith.name: Arathi Weaponsmith
Arathi Weaponsmith.flavor: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

Hellfire.name: Hellfire
Hellfire.flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

Mogor's Champion.name: Mogor's Champion
Mogor's Champion.flavor: This champion has learned from the best.  Except for his target selection.

Imp Master.name: Imp Master
Imp Master.flavor: She would enjoy the job a lot more if she just could get the imps to QUIT BITING HER.

Eerie Statue.name: Eerie Statue
Eerie Statue.flavor: Don't blink!  Don't turn your back, don't look away, and DON'T BLINK.

Blood Warriors.name: Blood Warriors
Blood Warriors.flavor: They have an uneasy rivalry with the Blood Paladins.

Mark of Nature.name: Mark of Nature
Mark of Nature.flavor: Druids call it the "Mark of Nature."  Everyone else calls it "needing a bath."

Coldlight Seer.name: Coldlight Seer
Coldlight Seer.flavor: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths.  So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

Cryomancer.name: Cryomancer
Cryomancer.flavor: She loves Frozen. I mean who doesn't?

Jade Behemoth.name: Jade Behemoth
Jade Behemoth.flavor: I think we should talk about the jade elephant in the room.

Mistress of Mixtures.name: Mistress of Mixtures
Mistress of Mixtures.flavor: Her favorite mixture is cola and lime.

Summoning Stone.name: Summoning Stone
Summoning Stone.flavor: Sometimes it feels like it's always the same slackers that are waiting for a summon.

Betrayal.name: Betrayal
Betrayal.flavor: Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.

Holy Champion.name: Holy Champion
Holy Champion.flavor: She really likes seeing people get better.  That's why she hurts them in the first place.

Kabal Songstealer.name: Kabal Songstealer
Kabal Songstealer.flavor: Gadgetzan Writer’s Award goes to the player who writes the most compelling fanfic about why this Arakkoa has a golden frog in his hand!

Ancient Mage.name: Ancient Mage
Ancient Mage.flavor: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else's game.

SI:7 Agent.name: SI:7 Agent
SI:7 Agent.flavor: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities.  Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

Humility.name: Humility
Humility.flavor: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

A Light in the Darkness.name: A Light in the Darkness
A Light in the Darkness.flavor: Wait, how can you have a light in the dark?  If you turn on a light while it’s dark, doesn’t that mean it’s no longer dark?

Animated Armor.name: Animated Armor
Animated Armor.flavor: Try putting it on.  Wait, let me get my camera.

C'Thun.name: C'Thun
C'Thun.flavor: C'Thun's least favorite Hearthstone card: Eye for an Eye.

Goblin Sapper.name: Goblin Sapper
Goblin Sapper.flavor: He’s not such a binge exploder anymore. These days, he only explodes socially.

Redemption.name: Redemption
Redemption.flavor: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  It’s a mystery!

Obsidian Destroyer.name: Obsidian Destroyer
Obsidian Destroyer.flavor: No obsidian is safe around the Obsidian Destroyer!

Piloted Sky Golem.name: Piloted Sky Golem
Piloted Sky Golem.flavor: The pinnacle of goblin engineering. Includes an espresso machine and foot massager.

Goblin Auto-Barber.name: Goblin Auto-Barber
Goblin Auto-Barber.flavor: This guy is excellent at adjusting your haircut and/or height.

Lightwell.name: Lightwell
Lightwell.flavor: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

Skycap'n Kragg.name: Skycap'n Kragg
Skycap'n Kragg.flavor: What's more boss than riding a parrot with a jawbone for a shoulderpad while wielding a giant hook-lance-thing and wearing a pirate hat?  NOTHING.

Avenging Wrath.name: Avenging Wrath
Avenging Wrath.flavor: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

Nerubian Egg.name: Nerubian Egg
Nerubian Egg.flavor: Eggs are a good source of protein and Nerubians.

Anub'arak.name: Anub'arak
Anub'arak.flavor: Was actually a pretty nice guy before, you know, the whole Lich King thing.

Mortal Coil.name: Mortal Coil
Mortal Coil.flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

Bolf Ramshield.name: Bolf Ramshield
Bolf Ramshield.flavor: Bolf keeps coming in 2nd at the Grand Tournament.  It might be his year this year, if Lebron doesn't enter.

Kabal Crystal Runner.name: Kabal Crystal Runner
Kabal Crystal Runner.flavor: "Listen, I can cut you in on a little of this premium mana, but you can't tell my boss."

Shado-Pan Rider.name: Shado-Pan Rider
Shado-Pan Rider.flavor: He needed a break after that business in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms. Naturally, he chose to spend his vacation in an icy snowscape killing monsters.

Eternal Sentinel.name: Eternal Sentinel
Eternal Sentinel.flavor: Just try to avoid eye contact.

Jade Shuriken.name: Jade Shuriken
Jade Shuriken.flavor: Good news is, after you remove it from your wound, you can use it to pay your medical bills!

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

Forked Lightning.name: Forked Lightning
Forked Lightning.flavor: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.

Anub'ar Ambusher.name: Anub'ar Ambusher
Anub'ar Ambusher.flavor: Originally he was called "Anub'ar Guy who bounces a guy back to your hand", but it lacked a certain zing.

Cult Master.name: Cult Master
Cult Master.flavor: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

Grimestreet Pawnbroker.name: Grimestreet Pawnbroker
Grimestreet Pawnbroker.flavor: "I don't know a lot about used GvG cards, so I'm going to have to call in an expert."

Big Game Hunter.name: Big Game Hunter
Big Game Hunter.flavor: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him.  Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

Hidden Cache.name: Hidden Cache
Hidden Cache.flavor: There is an urban legend that the first Toxic Sewer Ooze was born because a rookie Goon stashed an open container of milk in a Hidden Cache.

Tournament Medic.name: Tournament Medic
Tournament Medic.flavor: The medic tournament is less entertaining than the Grand Tournament.

Gelbin Mekkatorque.name: Gelbin Mekkatorque
Gelbin Mekkatorque.flavor: He's the leader of the gnomes, and an incredible inventor.  He's getting better, too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.

Demonfire.name: Demonfire
Demonfire.flavor: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP

Sergeant Sally.name: Sergeant Sally
Sergeant Sally.flavor: "Who is she?  Where did she come from?  We don't even have a police force here in Gadgetzan!!" - Mayor Noggenfogger

Dark Iron Skulker.name: Dark Iron Skulker
Dark Iron Skulker.flavor: He loves skulking. He skulks after hours just for the joy of it, but his friends are pretty worried he'll get burnt out.

Icehowl.name: Icehowl
Icehowl.flavor: This massive yeti just closes his eyes and charges at the nearest target.  The nearest Target is a couple blocks away and has sick deals on skateboards.

Buccaneer.name: Buccaneer
Buccaneer.flavor: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.

Celestial Dreamer.name: Celestial Dreamer
Celestial Dreamer.flavor: If you think her job is easy, YOU try falling asleep on cue.

Doomsayer.name: Doomsayer
Doomsayer.flavor: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

Mal'Ganis.name: Mal'Ganis
Mal'Ganis.flavor: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.

Polymorph.name: Polymorph
Polymorph.flavor: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

Hammer of Wrath.name: Hammer of Wrath
Hammer of Wrath.flavor: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

Medivh, the Guardian.name: Medivh, the Guardian
Medivh, the Guardian.flavor: If you think the party's great now, just wait 'til he invites the orcs over!

Starving Buzzard.name: Starving Buzzard
Starving Buzzard.flavor: If you feed him, he loses his whole identity.

Hired Gun.name: Hired Gun
Hired Gun.flavor: He loves his job and would do it for free!  (But don't tell his boss!)

Onyx Bishop.name: Onyx Bishop
Onyx Bishop.flavor: B4 is a nice place to visit, but he wouldn't want to live there.

Siltfin Spiritwalker.name: Siltfin Spiritwalker
Siltfin Spiritwalker.flavor: The elements respond to anyone who calls them for a worthy cause, even if you call them by yelling, "MRGHRGLGLGL!"

Sylvanas Windrunner.name: Sylvanas Windrunner
Sylvanas Windrunner.flavor: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

Maexxna.name: Maexxna
Maexxna.flavor: Maexxna gets super mad when people introduce her as "Maxina" or "Maxxy".

Troggzor the Earthinator.name: Troggzor the Earthinator
Troggzor the Earthinator.flavor: He keeps earthinating the countryside despite attempts to stop him.

Darkshire Alchemist.name: Darkshire Alchemist
Darkshire Alchemist.flavor: The secret ingredient: liquified funnel cake.

Herald Volazj.name: Herald Volazj
Herald Volazj.flavor: His whole job is yelling "Yogg-Saron comin'!"

Onyxia.name: Onyxia
Onyxia.flavor: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

Acolyte of Pain.name: Acolyte of Pain
Acolyte of Pain.flavor: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

Forbidden Healing.name: Forbidden Healing
Forbidden Healing.flavor: No one's quite sure why it's forbidden. And yes, that should make you nervous.

Hozen Healer.name: Hozen Healer
Hozen Healer.flavor: He didn't go to school for healing, but we keep losing all the good healers to Ratchet, so I guess we'll take him.

Feral Rage.name: Feral Rage
Feral Rage.flavor: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.

Elven Archer.name: Elven Archer
Elven Archer.flavor: Don't bother asking her out on a date.  She'll shoot you down.

Cogmaster's Wrench.name: Cogmaster's Wrench
Cogmaster's Wrench.flavor: For tightening cogs and smashin' troggs!

Mark of Y'Shaarj.name: Mark of Y'Shaarj
Mark of Y'Shaarj.flavor: Y'Shaarj had three sons: Mark, Theodore, and Chris.

Voidwalker.name: Voidwalker
Voidwalker.flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

Silver Hand Knight.name: Silver Hand Knight
Silver Hand Knight.flavor: It's good to be a knight.   Less so to be one's squire.

Violet Illusionist.name: Violet Illusionist
Violet Illusionist.flavor: She’s much more cheerful after losing the ‘n’ in her name.

Wild Growth.name: Wild Growth
Wild Growth.flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

Sorcerer's Apprentice.name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
Sorcerer's Apprentice.flavor: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

Patches the Pirate.name: Patches the Pirate
Patches the Pirate.flavor: What do sailors yell when Patches steals their treasure chest full of laws and other things being transported to parliament for a vote?  "The Eyes have it!"

Pint-Sized Summoner.name: Pint-Sized Summoner
Pint-Sized Summoner.flavor: She's quite jealous of the Gallon-Sized Summoner.

Daring Reporter.name: Daring Reporter
Daring Reporter.flavor: She's working on a story!  While skydiving!

Mayor Noggenfogger.name: Mayor Noggenfogger
Mayor Noggenfogger.flavor: This flavor text was randomly generated.  If it happens to form words and make sense, that is purely by chance.

Elemental Destruction.name: Elemental Destruction
Elemental Destruction.flavor: I'm not a shaman or anything, but isn't Elemental Destruction the opposite of what they want to do?

Rat Pack.name: Rat Pack
Rat Pack.flavor: He's gonna do it his way.

Chillmaw.name: Chillmaw
Chillmaw.flavor: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!

Murloc Tinyfin.name: Murloc Tinyfin
Murloc Tinyfin.flavor: High mortality rate, from often being hugged to death.

Velen's Chosen.name: Velen's Chosen
Velen's Chosen.flavor: Velen wrote a "Lovely Card" for Tyrande with a picture of the Deeprun Tram that said "I Choo-Choo-Choose you!"

Cogmaster.name: Cogmaster
Cogmaster.flavor: After a while, you don't see the cogs and sprockets. All you see is a robot, a spider tank, a deathray...

Scaled Nightmare.name: Scaled Nightmare
Scaled Nightmare.flavor: I like it because it scales.

Backstreet Leper.name: Backstreet Leper
Backstreet Leper.flavor: Quit playing games with his heart. And his fingers. And foot. It's rude.

Saboteur.name: Saboteur
Saboteur.flavor: Listen all y'all it's a saboteur!

Patient Assassin.name: Patient Assassin
Patient Assassin.flavor: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

Reno Jackson.name: Reno Jackson
Reno Jackson.flavor: Reno is a four-time winner of the 'Best Accessorized Explorer' award.

Twilight Flamecaller.name: Twilight Flamecaller
Twilight Flamecaller.flavor: Make sure you summon a Twilight Marshmallowcaller too! Mmmm Mmm Mmm!!

Dalaran Mage.name: Dalaran Mage
Dalaran Mage.flavor: You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

Grim Patron.name: Grim Patron
Grim Patron.flavor: If you love getting your face punched, come to the Grim Guzzler!

Entomb.name: Entomb
Entomb.flavor: It's perfectly safe as long as you remember to put in air holes.

Ogre Brute.name: Ogre Brute
Ogre Brute.flavor: Ogres have really terrible short-term chocolate.

Shield Block.name: Shield Block
Shield Block.flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

Tuskarr Jouster.name: Tuskarr Jouster
Tuskarr Jouster.flavor: Just could not be talked out of using his turtle for the joust...

Lock and Load.name: Lock and Load
Lock and Load.flavor:
Rexxar narrowed his eyes, grabbed his machine gun, and said: "It's go time.  Lock and load."
This card pays homage to that special moment.

Keeper of Uldaman.name: Keeper of Uldaman
Keeper of Uldaman.flavor: U da man!  No, U da man!

Hogger.name: Hogger
Hogger.flavor: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

Perdition's Blade.name: Perdition's Blade
Perdition's Blade.flavor: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

Mindgames.name: Mindgames
Mindgames.flavor: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

King's Defender.name: King's Defender
King's Defender.flavor: "King's Attacker" is a shield.  Funny, huh?

Sludge Belcher.name: Sludge Belcher
Sludge Belcher.flavor: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.

Ancestral Healing.name: Ancestral Healing
Ancestral Healing.flavor: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

Fandral Staghelm.name: Fandral Staghelm
Fandral Staghelm.flavor: Always manages to mention "Back when I was creating the World Tree…" in EVERY conversation. Sheesh! Enough already.

Lotus Agents.name: Lotus Agents
Lotus Agents.flavor: Mostly, they stand around and look cool.

King Mukla.name: King Mukla
King Mukla.flavor: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

Ancient Shade.name: Ancient Shade
Ancient Shade.flavor: Warning: Do not expose to direct sunlight.

Divine Strength.name: Divine Strength
Divine Strength.flavor: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.

Bolster.name: Bolster
Bolster.flavor: The best offense is a good defense.

Cat Trick.name: Cat Trick
Cat Trick.flavor: "I know some new tricks, a lot of good tricks. I will show them to you. Medivh will not mind at all if I do."

Ancestral Spirit.name: Ancestral Spirit
Ancestral Spirit.flavor: It was just a flesh wound.

Jeeves.name: Jeeves
Jeeves.flavor: This robot is a lean, mean, butlerin' machine.

Wrath.name: Wrath
Wrath.flavor: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

Explosive Trap.name: Explosive Trap
Explosive Trap.flavor: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

Barnes.name: Barnes
Barnes.flavor: He used to play every part, until Moroes confiscated his Orb of Deception.

Recruiter.name: Recruiter
Recruiter.flavor: Join the Argent Crusade!  We have attractive tabards and you get to carry really nice swords!

Netherspite Historian.name: Netherspite Historian
Netherspite Historian.flavor: She can tell you all about the history of people not STANDING IN THE GREEN BEAM!

Nat, the Darkfisher.name: Nat, the Darkfisher
Nat, the Darkfisher.flavor: You can take away his humanity, but you will never take away his fishing pole.

Shadow Strike.name: Shadow Strike
Shadow Strike.flavor: It's like a backstab, only from the front. And with two more stabs.

Bloodsail Cultist.name: Bloodsail Cultist
Bloodsail Cultist.flavor: They're really just in it for the Blood Parrot.

Hobgoblin.name: Hobgoblin
Hobgoblin.flavor: Hobgoblins are meeting next week to discuss union benefits.  First on the list: dental plan.

Coliseum Manager.name: Coliseum Manager
Coliseum Manager.flavor: Meets monthly with the gladiators to discuss career goals.

Duskboar.name: Duskboar
Duskboar.flavor: Often excluded from dinner parties.  To be fair, he is very boaring.

Anodized Robo Cub.name: Anodized Robo Cub
Anodized Robo Cub.flavor: It's adorable! AND OH MY GOODNESS WHY IS IT EATING MY FACE

Nourish.name: Nourish
Nourish.flavor: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

Wailing Soul.name: Wailing Soul
Wailing Soul.flavor: This soul just wails on you. Dang, soul, let up already.

Dirty Rat.name: Dirty Rat
Dirty Rat.flavor: It's not his fault…  Someone keeps stealing his soap!

Goldshire Footman.name: Goldshire Footman
Goldshire Footman.flavor: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

Excavated Evil.name: Excavated Evil
Excavated Evil.flavor: MOM! DAD! DON'T TOUCH IT! IT'S EVIL!!!!!!

Hooded Acolyte.name: Hooded Acolyte
Hooded Acolyte.flavor: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?

Dragonhawk Rider.name: Dragonhawk Rider
Dragonhawk Rider.flavor: Check it out.  You can do barrel rolls on this thing.

Malchezaar's Imp.name: Malchezaar's Imp
Malchezaar's Imp.flavor: Malchezaar used to have an imp named Dobby working for him, but there was a tragic accident.

Darkspeaker.name: Darkspeaker
Darkspeaker.flavor: People often think that Darkspeaker is the arch nemesis of Lightspeaker, but that title actually belongs to Heavyspeaker.

Eater of Secrets.name: Eater of Secrets
Eater of Secrets.flavor: You don't want to be around after it has eaten an explosive trap.  You thought Sludge Belcher was bad...

Moroes.name: Moroes
Moroes.flavor: Moroes runs an army of stewards, but still ends up inflating the balloons himself.

Pit Lord.name: Pit Lord
Pit Lord.flavor: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

Gnomish Inventor.name: Gnomish Inventor
Gnomish Inventor.flavor: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

Keeper of the Grove.name: Keeper of the Grove
Keeper of the Grove.flavor: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

Friendly Bartender.name: Friendly Bartender
Friendly Bartender.flavor: "What'll it be?  A Jade Brew?  A Grimy Goose?  A Kabal Manatini?"

Siphon Soul.name: Siphon Soul
Siphon Soul.flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

Sir Finley Mrrgglton.name: Sir Finley Mrrgglton
Sir Finley Mrrgglton.flavor: In addition to fluent Common, he also speaks fourteen dialects of 'mrgl'.

Mogor the Ogre.name: Mogor the Ogre
Mogor the Ogre.flavor: Mogor helped reopen the Dark Portal once. You know you're in trouble when you have to rely on an ogre.

Twisted Worgen.name: Twisted Worgen
Twisted Worgen.flavor: Sometimes the Old Gods' corruptions gives you power untold, sometimes you get +1 Attack. We can’t all be winners in the Eldritch lottery.

Alexstrasza's Champion.name: Alexstrasza's Champion
Alexstrasza's Champion.flavor: "Put more spikes on her.  No, more spikes.  What part of 'more spikes' do you not understand?  MORE SPIKES!" - Alexstrasza

Mass Dispel.name: Mass Dispel
Mass Dispel.flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

Steamwheedle Sniper.name: Steamwheedle Sniper
Steamwheedle Sniper.flavor: Goblins seldom have the patience for sniping. Most prefer lobbing explosives.

Grimestreet Outfitter.name: Grimestreet Outfitter
Grimestreet Outfitter.flavor: If you bargain hard, he'll throw in the hat.

Cruel Taskmaster.name: Cruel Taskmaster
Cruel Taskmaster.flavor: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

Gnomish Experimenter.name: Gnomish Experimenter
Gnomish Experimenter.flavor: He's legitimately surprised every time he turns himself into a chicken.

Argent Lance.name: Argent Lance
Argent Lance.flavor: The stripes make it look like a candy cane, but we recommend against licking it.

Bladed Cultist.name: Bladed Cultist
Bladed Cultist.flavor: He has a poor understanding of the law of diminishing returns.

Wrathion.name: Wrathion
Wrathion.flavor: Wrathion, son of Deathwing, is a dragon.  Why isn't he tagged as a dragon, you ask?  WHAT, ARE YOU TRYING TO BLOW HIS COVER??

War Golem.name: War Golem
War Golem.flavor: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?

Darkbomb.name: Darkbomb
Darkbomb.flavor: If you're looking to make an "Emo" deck, this card is perfect!

Darkscale Healer.name: Darkscale Healer
Darkscale Healer.flavor: Healing is just something she does in her free time.  It's more of a hobby really.

Fearsome Doomguard.name: Fearsome Doomguard
Fearsome Doomguard.flavor: They were originally called Cuddleguards, but they were not inspiring the proper amount of fear.

Raging Worgen.name: Raging Worgen
Raging Worgen.flavor: If he's raging now, just wait until he gets nerfed.

Deadly Shot.name: Deadly Shot
Deadly Shot.flavor: Accuracy is not a highly valued trait among the mok'nathal.  Deadliness is near the top, though.

Faerie Dragon.name: Faerie Dragon
Faerie Dragon.flavor: Adorable.  Immune to Magic.  Doesn't pee on the rug.  The perfect pet!

Abomination.name: Abomination
Abomination.flavor: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

Savage Roar.name: Savage Roar
Savage Roar.flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

Magnataur Alpha.name: Magnataur Alpha
Magnataur Alpha.flavor: Playing him also gets you into the Magnataur Beta.

Call of the Wild.name: Call of the Wild
Call of the Wild.flavor: "Hello. Misha, Leokk and Huffer aren't here right now, but if you leave a message we'll get back to you right away." BEEP.

Demonfuse.name: Demonfuse
Demonfuse.flavor: Very dangerous when attached to a demonbomb.

Stampeding Kodo.name: Stampeding Kodo
Stampeding Kodo.flavor: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

Muster for Battle.name: Muster for Battle
Muster for Battle.flavor: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

Pit Fighter.name: Pit Fighter
Pit Fighter.flavor: What did the pits ever do to you?

Undercity Huckster.name: Undercity Huckster
Undercity Huckster.flavor: Psst! Wanna buy a random class card (from your opponent's class)?

Cutpurse.name: Cutpurse
Cutpurse.flavor: He has a giant collection of purses now.  One for every outfit!

Molten Giant.name: Molten Giant
Molten Giant.flavor: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

Vaporize.name: Vaporize
Vaporize.flavor: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

Small-Time Buccaneer.name: Small-Time Buccaneer
Small-Time Buccaneer.flavor: "Oh, I'm not serious about it.  I only pirate on the weekends."

Battle Rage.name: Battle Rage
Battle Rage.flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

Gahz'rilla.name: Gahz'rilla
Gahz'rilla.flavor: The Sen'jin High football team is The Gahz'rillas.

Stalagg.name: Stalagg
Stalagg.flavor: Stalagg want to write own flavor text.  "STALAGG AWESOME!"

Bomb Lobber.name: Bomb Lobber
Bomb Lobber.flavor: He lobbies Orgrimmar daily on behalf of bombs.

Zealous Initiate.name: Zealous Initiate
Zealous Initiate.flavor: Ok, Initiate. You need to settle down and do your job. In this case, that means die so someone else can get a minor buff.

Gazlowe.name: Gazlowe
Gazlowe.flavor: Gazlowe was voted "Most Likely to Explode" in high school.

Flame Juggler.name: Flame Juggler
Flame Juggler.flavor: At first he liked juggling chain saws, but then he thought, "Flames are better!  Because FIRE!"

Kezan Mystic.name: Kezan Mystic
Kezan Mystic.flavor: They pretend to be wise and enlightened, but they mostly just hate to be left out of a secret.

Spirit Claws.name: Spirit Claws
Spirit Claws.flavor: They'll be MUCH easier to use once they add the spiritthumb.

Lance Carrier.name: Lance Carrier
Lance Carrier.flavor: Lance Carrier is an obscure entry level position in orcish armies.  A mystery, since orcs don't generally use lances.

Innervate.name: Innervate
Innervate.flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

Divine Favor.name: Divine Favor
Divine Favor.flavor: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!

Nefarian.name: Nefarian
Nefarian.flavor: They call him "Blackwing" because he's a black dragon...... and he's got wings.

Toxic Sewer Ooze.name: Toxic Sewer Ooze
Toxic Sewer Ooze.flavor: When Sergeant Sally shows up unexpectedly, DO NOT FLUSH YOUR MANA CRYSTALS DOWN THE TOILET.

Abyssal Enforcer.name: Abyssal Enforcer
Abyssal Enforcer.flavor: The Kabal print this on every package of illicit Mana Crystals: WARNING - DO NOT PUT WITHIN REACH OF ABYSSALS. THIS IS NOT APPROVED FOR USE BY FLAMING DEMONS OF ANY KIND.

Shadow Word: Horror.name: Shadow Word: Horror
Shadow Word: Horror.flavor: It's more succinct than "Shadow Word: Suck Into Vortex."

Inner Rage.name: Inner Rage
Inner Rage.flavor: They're only smiling on the outside.

Blackwing Corruptor.name: Blackwing Corruptor
Blackwing Corruptor.flavor: He got his name when he gave Blackwing some comic books and rock & roll records.

Venture Co. Mercenary.name: Venture Co. Mercenary
Venture Co. Mercenary.flavor: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.

Boulderfist Ogre.name: Boulderfist Ogre
Boulderfist Ogre.flavor: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

Infest.name: Infest
Infest.flavor: The best part is the look on their face when you jump out of the cake! Err… corpse.

One-eyed Cheat.name: One-eyed Cheat
One-eyed Cheat.flavor: When pirates say there is no "Eye" in "team," they are very literal about it.

Ice Rager.name: Ice Rager
Ice Rager.flavor: He's a lot cooler than Magma Rager.

Grimestreet Informant.name: Grimestreet Informant
Grimestreet Informant.flavor: "Naw, naw.  You're talkin' about Grime BOULEVARD.  I ain't know nuthin' 'bout that."

Fool's Bane.name: Fool's Bane
Fool's Bane.flavor: A fool and his bane are soon parted.

Bilefin Tidehunter.name: Bilefin Tidehunter
Bilefin Tidehunter.flavor: Bile actually makes for surprisingly sturdy fins.

Reckless Rocketeer.name: Reckless Rocketeer
Reckless Rocketeer.flavor: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.

Kabal Courier.name: Kabal Courier
Kabal Courier.flavor: Hey, you park your kodo under a harpy nest, you get what you deserve.

The Skeleton Knight.name: The Skeleton Knight
The Skeleton Knight.flavor: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.

Doomhammer.name: Doomhammer
Doomhammer.flavor: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

Blackwater Pirate.name: Blackwater Pirate
Blackwater Pirate.flavor: "Look, they fell off the back of a ship, do you want them or not? I have a meeting with Y'Shaarj in like ten minutes."

Ancient of War.name: Ancient of War
Ancient of War.flavor: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

Defias Cleaner.name: Defias Cleaner
Defias Cleaner.flavor: His house cleaning service is quite thorough.  Not a spot to be found... or any of your stuff!

Dart Trap.name: Dart Trap
Dart Trap.flavor: Five years of tap-dancing lessons are FINALLY going to pay off!

Shadow Word: Death.name: Shadow Word: Death
Shadow Word: Death.flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

Gadgetzan Jouster.name: Gadgetzan Jouster
Gadgetzan Jouster.flavor: It's not HER fault you didn't put a spinning saw blade on your horse.

Ancient of Lore.name: Ancient of Lore
Ancient of Lore.flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

Scarlet Purifier.name: Scarlet Purifier
Scarlet Purifier.flavor: The Scarlet Crusade is doing market research to find out if the "Mauve Crusade" would be better received.

I Know a Guy.name: I Know a Guy
I Know a Guy.flavor: Well… a guy who knows a guy.

Captured Jormungar.name: Captured Jormungar
Captured Jormungar.flavor: You can keep him, but you have to promise to feed him and clean out his tank every day!

Spellslinger.name: Spellslinger
Spellslinger.flavor: Does he sling spells, or do his spells linger about.  Who can say?

Emperor Cobra.name: Emperor Cobra
Emperor Cobra.flavor: The Sholazar Basin is home to a lot of really horrible things. If you're going to visit, wear bug spray.  And plate armor.

Warbot.name: Warbot
Warbot.flavor: Mass production of warbots was halted when it was discovered that they were accidentally being produced at "sample size."

Stablemaster.name: Stablemaster
Stablemaster.flavor: Takes way better care of her pets than her brother, Unstablemaster.

Gadgetzan Auctioneer.name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
Gadgetzan Auctioneer.flavor: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

Whirling Zap-o-matic.name: Whirling Zap-o-matic
Whirling Zap-o-matic.flavor: If you pay a little extra, you can get it in "candy-apple red."

Neptulon.name: Neptulon
Neptulon.flavor: Neptulon is "The Tidehunter". He’s one of the four elemental lords. And he and Ragnaros get together and make really amazing saunas.

Malorne.name: Malorne
Malorne.flavor: When Malorne isn't mauling hordes of demons, he enjoys attending parties, though he prefers to go stag.

Gadgetzan Socialite.name: Gadgetzan Socialite
Gadgetzan Socialite.flavor: Comment on her height, and she'll go from flapper to kneecapper in seconds flat.

Sunwalker.name: Sunwalker
Sunwalker.flavor: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Don’t worry!

Archmage.name: Archmage
Archmage.flavor: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

Nozdormu.name: Nozdormu
Nozdormu.flavor: Time to write some flavor text.

Snake Trap.name: Snake Trap
Snake Trap.flavor: Why did it have to be snakes?

Power of the Wild.name: Power of the Wild
Power of the Wild.flavor: Never look a panther in the eye.  Or is it 'Always look a panther in the eye'?  Well, it's one of those.

Manic Soulcaster.name: Manic Soulcaster
Manic Soulcaster.flavor: When casting a tournament, you really have to put your soul into it!

Shadow Bolt.name: Shadow Bolt
Shadow Bolt.flavor: It’s a Bolt.   It's made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

Argent Commander.name: Argent Commander
Argent Commander.flavor: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

Backroom Bouncer.name: Backroom Bouncer
Backroom Bouncer.flavor: "WHY ARE YOU IN THE BACK ROOM?  WHO IS WATCHING THE FRONT?!"

Justicar Trueheart.name: Justicar Trueheart
Justicar Trueheart.flavor: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

Frothing Berserker.name: Frothing Berserker
Frothing Berserker.flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

Priestess of Elune.name: Priestess of Elune
Priestess of Elune.flavor: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

Pyroblast.name: Pyroblast
Pyroblast.flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

Mad Scientist.name: Mad Scientist
Mad Scientist.flavor: His mother wanted him to be a mage or a warlock, but noooooooo, he had to go and be a scientist like his father.

Voodoo Doctor.name: Voodoo Doctor
Voodoo Doctor.flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

Violet Teacher.name: Violet Teacher
Violet Teacher.flavor: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig.  And then you get your name on the board.

Shady Dealer.name: Shady Dealer
Shady Dealer.flavor: I have great deal for you... for 4 damage to your face!

Corruption.name: Corruption
Corruption.flavor: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOM!  Corrupted!

Pantry Spider.name: Pantry Spider
Pantry Spider.flavor: You have to admit, they make a cute couple.

Tinkmaster Overspark.name: Tinkmaster Overspark
Tinkmaster Overspark.flavor: Tinkmaster Overspark nearly lost his Tinker's license after the Great Ironforge Squirrel Stampede of '09.

Bloodsail Raider.name: Bloodsail Raider
Bloodsail Raider.flavor: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

Stormwind Knight.name: Stormwind Knight
Stormwind Knight.flavor: They're still embarrassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

Arcanosmith.name: Arcanosmith
Arcanosmith.flavor: He’s really just a Blacksmith, but he thought the fancy title would bring in more business.

Starfall.name: Starfall
Starfall.flavor: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.

Cone of Cold.name: Cone of Cold
Cone of Cold.flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

Tanaris Hogchopper.name: Tanaris Hogchopper
Tanaris Hogchopper.flavor: The Hogchoppers are well-known throughout Kalimdor for being a real, actual group.

Greater Arcane Missiles.name: Greater Arcane Missiles
Greater Arcane Missiles.flavor: Wow, and I thought Arcane Missiles was great!

Auctionmaster Beardo.name: Auctionmaster Beardo
Auctionmaster Beardo.flavor: Gadgetzan has always run an under-the-table auction house, and business has been PRETTY good for Beardo since the population explosion.  And since the explosion that destroyed the competing auction houses in the city.

Nexus-Champion Saraad.name: Nexus-Champion Saraad
Nexus-Champion Saraad.flavor: The ethereals have their own jousting tournament, and Saraad is the reigning champion.  Also he won the ethereal hot dog eating contest.

Spellbreaker.name: Spellbreaker
Spellbreaker.flavor: Spellbreakers can rip enchantments from magic-wielders.  The process is painless and can be performed on an outpatient basis.

Mirror Entity.name: Mirror Entity
Mirror Entity.flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

Kabal Trafficker.name: Kabal Trafficker
Kabal Trafficker.flavor: She ships illicit mana crystals around the world in packages marked: FUNNEL CAKE.

Evil Heckler.name: Evil Heckler
Evil Heckler.flavor: To be honest, heckling is not the most effective form of evil.

Frostwolf Grunt.name: Frostwolf Grunt
Frostwolf Grunt.flavor: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that.   It's more than just a job.

Mind Blast.name: Mind Blast
Mind Blast.flavor: This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.

Feign Death.name: Feign Death
Feign Death.flavor: The hardest part about doing a "Feign Death" convincingly is learning how to make the right smell. It takes a lot of commitment.

Dragon Consort.name: Dragon Consort
Dragon Consort.flavor: Everybody wants someone to snuggle with. Even giant armored scaly draconic beasts of destruction.

Kazakus.name: Kazakus
Kazakus.flavor: The mysterious leader of the Kabal is NOT a dragon, and does NOT deal in illegal potions.  Any public statements to the contrary will be met with litigation and Dragonfire Potions.

Lava Shock.name: Lava Shock
Lava Shock.flavor: Chocolate lava cake is shockingly delicious.

Cloaked Huntress.name: Cloaked Huntress
Cloaked Huntress.flavor: She's practically GIVING your secrets away!

Leeroy Jenkins.name: Leeroy Jenkins
Leeroy Jenkins.flavor: At least he has Angry Chicken.

Blood of The Ancient One.name: Blood of The Ancient One
Blood of The Ancient One.flavor: Add two cups of Blood of the Ancient One to one cup of lemon juice. Add just a dash of sugar and stir. Delicious!

Undertaker.name: Undertaker
Undertaker.flavor: In a world where you can run to a spirit healer and resurrect yourself, Undertakers do pretty light business.

Kirin Tor Mage.name: Kirin Tor Mage
Kirin Tor Mage.flavor: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

Earth Shock.name: Earth Shock
Earth Shock.flavor: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?

Vol'jin.name: Vol'jin
Vol'jin.flavor: Vol'jin is a shadow hunter, which is like a shadow priest except more voodoo.

Refreshment Vendor.name: Refreshment Vendor
Refreshment Vendor.flavor: Menu:  Funnel cakes, carrots, popcorn, jormungar steaks.  It's hard serving a diverse clientele.

Curse of Rafaam.name: Curse of Rafaam
Curse of Rafaam.flavor: This is what happens when Rafaam stubs his toe unexpectedly.

Wilfred Fizzlebang.name: Wilfred Fizzlebang
Wilfred Fizzlebang.flavor:
He can summon anything, even a FEARSOME DOOMGUARD*.
*He's pretty sure this is going to work out.

Medivh's Valet.name: Medivh's Valet
Medivh's Valet.flavor: "Magus Medivh sir, I've brought the flaming balloons, as you requested."

Argent Watchman.name: Argent Watchman
Argent Watchman.flavor: Who argent watches the Argent Watchman?

Knight of the Wild.name: Knight of the Wild
Knight of the Wild.flavor: He gets a discount on the tournament entry fee because he is his own horse.

Edwin VanCleef.name: Edwin VanCleef
Edwin VanCleef.flavor: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

Ironbeak Owl.name: Ironbeak Owl
Ironbeak Owl.flavor: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

Kodorider.name: Kodorider
Kodorider.flavor: Someone called her a Rhinorider, and she's NOT HAPPY.

Firelands Portal.name: Firelands Portal
Firelands Portal.flavor: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"

Forbidden Flame.name: Forbidden Flame
Forbidden Flame.flavor: WARNING: This flame is not to be used unless you are a licensed acolyte of the Old Gods.

Drakonid Operative.name: Drakonid Operative
Drakonid Operative.flavor: His job is to spy on the Goons and the Jade Lotus, but he's OBVIOUSLY a dragon so it's pretty hard work.

Nat Pagle.name: Nat Pagle
Nat Pagle.flavor: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman!  He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

Warhorse Trainer.name: Warhorse Trainer
Warhorse Trainer.flavor: He doesn't even get Sundays off.  Every day he's hostling.

Sleep with the Fishes.name: Sleep with the Fishes
Sleep with the Fishes.flavor: If you're sleeping with the fishes, we highly suggest not bringing an electric blanket.

Windfury.name: Windfury
Windfury.flavor: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

Maiden of the Lake.name: Maiden of the Lake
Maiden of the Lake.flavor: Not a good basis for a system of government.

Frostbolt.name: Frostbolt
Frostbolt.flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

Prophet Velen.name: Prophet Velen
Prophet Velen.flavor: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

Nightbane Templar.name: Nightbane Templar
Nightbane Templar.flavor: Originally joined to be Arcanagos’ Templar, but has to admit that ordering pizza has become waaaay easier.

Dark Wispers.name: Dark Wispers
Dark Wispers.flavor: Don't worry; we fired the person who named this card.

Archmage Antonidas.name: Archmage Antonidas
Archmage Antonidas.flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

Explorer's Hat.name: Explorer's Hat
Explorer's Hat.flavor: Harrison Jones was disappointed that he didn't get to be part of the League of Explorers, but his hat did.

Shadowflame.name: Shadowflame
Shadowflame.flavor: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

Shieldbearer.name: Shieldbearer
Shieldbearer.flavor: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game??  This is no easy job.

Spawn of Shadows.name: Spawn of Shadows
Spawn of Shadows.flavor: What did you expect to happen?  He's a Spawn.  Of Shadows.

Tunnel Trogg.name: Tunnel Trogg
Tunnel Trogg.flavor: Sure, they're ugly, but they live in tunnels.  You try your beauty routine without natural light.

Flamewaker.name: Flamewaker
Flamewaker.flavor: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they don’t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.

Assassinate.name: Assassinate
Assassinate.flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

Lil' Exorcist.name: Lil' Exorcist
Lil' Exorcist.flavor: Warlocks have the town exorcist on speed dial in case they unleash the wrong demon.

Dragonfire Potion.name: Dragonfire Potion
Dragonfire Potion.flavor: No one was brave enough to fire the dragon in person… so they made the potion do it.

Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound.name: Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound
Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound.flavor: When he's working out, he binds all that rage back into a ponytail.

Lotus Assassin.name: Lotus Assassin
Lotus Assassin.flavor: For 5000g, you can just give the Jade Lotus any name and they will assassinate and/or embarrass them.

Deadly Poison.name: Deadly Poison
Deadly Poison.flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

Blingtron 3000.name: Blingtron 3000
Blingtron 3000.flavor: PREPARE PARTY SERVOS FOR IMMEDIATE DEPLOYMENT.

Giant Sand Worm.name: Giant Sand Worm
Giant Sand Worm.flavor: Banned from every all-you-can-eat buffet on Azeroth.

Brawl.name: Brawl
Brawl.flavor: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

Murloc Tidecaller.name: Murloc Tidecaller
Murloc Tidecaller.flavor: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

Anima Golem.name: Anima Golem
Anima Golem.flavor: The Dark Animus is evil and mysterious and huge and unable to write sentences that utilize proper grammar.

Mech-Bear-Cat.name: Mech-Bear-Cat
Mech-Bear-Cat.flavor: Crushes buildings with his BEAR hands.

Headcrack.name: Headcrack
Headcrack.flavor: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

Wickerflame Burnbristle.name: Wickerflame Burnbristle
Wickerflame Burnbristle.flavor: Wickerflame spent years as a recruit for the Goons, never making the big-time because he always fired his chest-cannon too slowly.  "Hey," he thought, "maybe if I keep my beard lit on fire, I can do this faster."  BOOM, promoted.

Cenarius.name: Cenarius
Cenarius.flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

Consecration.name: Consecration
Consecration.flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

Sneed's Old Shredder.name: Sneed's Old Shredder
Sneed's Old Shredder.flavor: When Sneed was defeated in the Deadmines, his shredder was sold at auction to an anonymous buyer. (Probably Hogger.)

Shaky Zipgunner.name: Shaky Zipgunner
Shaky Zipgunner.flavor: The Grimy Goons can get you any weapon you want but if you want it to not explode you gotta pay extra.

Gorillabot A-3.name: Gorillabot A-3
Gorillabot A-3.flavor: A-1 and A-2 went nuts, when they should have gone bolts.

Grook Fu Master.name: Grook Fu Master
Grook Fu Master.flavor: Grook Fu, the ancient Hozen art of bashing heads with a stick.

Antique Healbot.name: Antique Healbot
Antique Healbot.flavor: They don't make 'em like they used to! (Because of explosions, mostly.)

Clockwork Gnome.name: Clockwork Gnome
Clockwork Gnome.flavor: Clockwork gnomes are always asking what time it is.

Murloc Knight.name: Murloc Knight
Murloc Knight.flavor: Hee hee!  Look at his cute little feet.

Kabal Talonpriest.name: Kabal Talonpriest
Kabal Talonpriest.flavor: Inkmaster Solia had to figure out how to tattoo feathers.

Everyfin is Awesome.name: Everyfin is Awesome
Everyfin is Awesome.flavor: Everyfin is cool when you're part of a murloc team!

Fiery War Axe.name: Fiery War Axe
Fiery War Axe.flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

Faceless Shambler.name: Faceless Shambler
Faceless Shambler.flavor: "What is that thing?!" "I'm not sure, but it seems to be sort of Ysera shaped."

Mana Tide Totem.name: Mana Tide Totem
Mana Tide Totem.flavor: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

Maelstrom Portal.name: Maelstrom Portal
Maelstrom Portal.flavor: They bill this as a popular resort attraction, but they try and get your money up front.

Wisp.name: Wisp
Wisp.flavor: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode.   But why?

Soulfire.name: Soulfire
Soulfire.flavor: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

Ethereal Arcanist.name: Ethereal Arcanist
Ethereal Arcanist.flavor: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

Grimestreet Enforcer.name: Grimestreet Enforcer
Grimestreet Enforcer.flavor: "Sir, you don't have a permit to park your mount here."

Solemn Vigil.name: Solemn Vigil
Solemn Vigil.flavor: Each year, folk gather in front of Blackrock Mountain to mourn those who were mind-controlled into the lava.

Grove Tender.name: Grove Tender
Grove Tender.flavor: Likes: Hiking and the great outdoors. Dislikes: Goblin shredders and sandals. (Can’t find any that fit!).

Lord Jaraxxus.name: Lord Jaraxxus
Lord Jaraxxus.flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

Corrupted Seer.name: Corrupted Seer
Corrupted Seer.flavor: For seers, it's very handy to have your crystal ball hanging right in front of your face.

Gilblin Stalker.name: Gilblin Stalker
Gilblin Stalker.flavor:
"Shhh, I think I hear something."
"Ah, it's probably nothing." - Every Henchman

Animal Companion.name: Animal Companion
Animal Companion.flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

Druid of the Claw.name: Druid of the Claw
Druid of the Claw.flavor: Cat or Bear?  Cat or Bear?!  I just cannot CHOOSE!

Sacrificial Pact.name: Sacrificial Pact
Sacrificial Pact.flavor: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

Mark of the Wild.name: Mark of the Wild
Mark of the Wild.flavor: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

Silvermoon Guardian.name: Silvermoon Guardian
Silvermoon Guardian.flavor: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didn’t go so well…

Webspinner.name: Webspinner
Webspinner.flavor: Spider cocoons are like little piñatas!

Mana Wyrm.name: Mana Wyrm
Mana Wyrm.flavor: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

Poison Seeds.name: Poison Seeds
Poison Seeds.flavor: "Poisonseed Bagel" is the least popular bagel at McTiggin's Druidic Bagel Emporium.

Flame Lance.name: Flame Lance
Flame Lance.flavor: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

Tauren Warrior.name: Tauren Warrior
Tauren Warrior.flavor: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.

Commanding Shout.name: Commanding Shout
Commanding Shout.flavor: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training

Annoy-o-Tron.name: Annoy-o-Tron
Annoy-o-Tron.flavor: The inventor of the Annoy-o-Tron was immediately expelled from Tinkerschool, Tinkertown, and was eventually exiled from the Eastern Kingdoms altogether.

Dragon's Breath.name: Dragon's Breath
Dragon's Breath.flavor: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy?  It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.

Ice Block.name: Ice Block
Ice Block.flavor: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

Shifting Shade.name: Shifting Shade
Shifting Shade.flavor: Yeah, it's cooler in the shade, but you're also more likely to get JACKED.

Ragnaros, Lightlord.name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
Ragnaros, Lightlord.flavor: What happens when you try and corrupt a corrupted firelord? DOUBLE NEGATIVE, INSECT!

Unearthed Raptor.name: Unearthed Raptor
Unearthed Raptor.flavor: Still hunting for the ones who earthed him.

Forbidden Ancient.name: Forbidden Ancient
Forbidden Ancient.flavor: This Ancient was banned from the local tavern after tucking a 'Dr. Boom' up its sleeve.

Bouncing Blade.name: Bouncing Blade
Bouncing Blade.flavor: Only goblins would think this was a good idea. Even they are starting to have their doubts.

Dread Infernal.name: Dread Infernal
Dread Infernal.flavor: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

Infested Wolf.name: Infested Wolf
Infested Wolf.flavor: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

Fen Creeper.name: Fen Creeper
Fen Creeper.flavor: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn't an actual beast.   Boom, New Name!

Twin Emperor Vek'lor.name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
Twin Emperor Vek'lor.flavor: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."

Wicked Witchdoctor.name: Wicked Witchdoctor
Wicked Witchdoctor.flavor: You can easily defeat her by either dealing 4 damage, or dropping a house on her.

Mind Control.name: Mind Control
Mind Control.flavor: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

Bloodmage Thalnos.name: Bloodmage Thalnos
Bloodmage Thalnos.flavor: He's in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

Unbound Elemental.name: Unbound Elemental
Unbound Elemental.flavor: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

Bomb Squad.name: Bomb Squad
Bomb Squad.flavor: Please don't explode!  Please don't explode!  Please don't explode!

Sword of Justice.name: Sword of Justice
Sword of Justice.flavor: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

Flame Leviathan.name: Flame Leviathan
Flame Leviathan.flavor: Mimiron likes to take the Flame Leviathan out on some sweet joyrides.

Thing from Below.name: Thing from Below
Thing from Below.flavor: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

Shadowcaster.name: Shadowcaster
Shadowcaster.flavor: I mean, it's not creepy if you ASK before you steal their shadow to make a small replica of them to keep on your shelf.

Prince Malchezaar.name: Prince Malchezaar
Prince Malchezaar.flavor: He was super excited to acquire Gorehowl at a garage sale!  Then super disappointed to find out it was a foam reproduction.

Wisps of the Old Gods.name: Wisps of the Old Gods
Wisps of the Old Gods.flavor: They're just normal wisps, actually. The "Of the Old Gods" bit is just marketing.

Menagerie Magician.name: Menagerie Magician
Menagerie Magician.flavor: Just between us, if things get tight the Menagerie Magician position will probably be the first to go.

Foe Reaper 4000.name: Foe Reaper 4000
Foe Reaper 4000.flavor: Foe reaping is really not so different from harvest reaping, at the end of the day.

Heroic Strike.name: Heroic Strike
Heroic Strike.flavor: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

Harrison Jones.name: Harrison Jones
Harrison Jones.flavor: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

Oasis Snapjaw.name: Oasis Snapjaw
Oasis Snapjaw.flavor: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

Stonesplinter Trogg.name: Stonesplinter Trogg
Stonesplinter Trogg.flavor: The only thing worse than smelling troggs is listening to their poetry.

Silithid Swarmer.name: Silithid Swarmer
Silithid Swarmer.flavor: If your hero doesn't attack, it's just "Silithid Loner".

Savagery.name: Savagery
Savagery.flavor: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.

Hemet Nesingwary.name: Hemet Nesingwary
Hemet Nesingwary.flavor: It's hard to make a living as a hunter in a world where beasts instantly reappear minutes after you kill them.

Enter the Coliseum.name: Enter the Coliseum
Enter the Coliseum.flavor: You have to get past the vendors first.  So many are lost to shopping...

Twilight Darkmender.name: Twilight Darkmender
Twilight Darkmender.flavor: First she separates them from the lights, washes them in cold water, and hang-dries.

Snipe.name: Snipe
Snipe.flavor: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

Bash.name: Bash
Bash.flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice.  It doesn't.

Anyfin Can Happen.name: Anyfin Can Happen
Anyfin Can Happen.flavor: Theme song by Ellie Goldfin and Blagghghlrlrl Harris.

Jeweled Scarab.name: Jeweled Scarab
Jeweled Scarab.flavor: It's amazing what you can do with super glue!

Weasel Tunneler.name: Weasel Tunneler
Weasel Tunneler.flavor: He's the reason the First Bank of Gadgetzan has steel floors.

Spellbender.name: Spellbender
Spellbender.flavor: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

Gladiator's Longbow.name: Gladiator's Longbow
Gladiator's Longbow.flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

Lava Burst.name: Lava Burst
Lava Burst.flavor: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

Malygos.name: Malygos
Malygos.flavor: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

Temple Enforcer.name: Temple Enforcer
Temple Enforcer.flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

Small-Time Recruits.name: Small-Time Recruits
Small-Time Recruits.flavor: Now we know why they wear tiny watches.

Arcane Golem.name: Arcane Golem
Arcane Golem.flavor: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.

Shifter Zerus.name: Shifter Zerus
Shifter Zerus.flavor: It's like being able to play with THREE angry chickens!

Starfire.name: Starfire
Starfire.flavor: Balance is important to druids.  This card is perfectly balanced.

Disciple of C'Thun.name: Disciple of C'Thun
Disciple of C'Thun.flavor: C’Thun’s recruiting pitch involves cookies, which is why it’s the most popular Old God.

Forbidden Shaping.name: Forbidden Shaping
Forbidden Shaping.flavor: But the minion arrives covered in goo.

Madam Goya.name: Madam Goya
Madam Goya.flavor: She has set up her Black Market here in Gadgetzan for one purpose, to make a KILLING when Beanie Babies make their inevitable comeback.

N'Zoth, the Corruptor.name: N'Zoth, the Corruptor
N'Zoth, the Corruptor.flavor: Has not been able to get "Under the Sea" out of his head for like FIVE THOUSAND YEARS.

Defias Ringleader.name: Defias Ringleader
Defias Ringleader.flavor: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

Shadowstep.name: Shadowstep
Shadowstep.flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.

Fight Promoter.name: Fight Promoter
Fight Promoter.flavor: "Yeah, I can get you Knuckles.  No, no, he's been clean for *weeks*."

Tournament Attendee.name: Tournament Attendee
Tournament Attendee.flavor: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament.  He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.

Blastcrystal Potion.name: Blastcrystal Potion
Blastcrystal Potion.flavor: There's a fine line between "potion" and "grenade". Wait. Actually, there's not.

Captain Greenskin.name: Captain Greenskin
Captain Greenskin.flavor: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

Bestial Wrath.name: Bestial Wrath
Bestial Wrath.flavor: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface.  Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.

Stranglethorn Tiger.name: Stranglethorn Tiger
Stranglethorn Tiger.flavor: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

Lorewalker Cho.name: Lorewalker Cho
Lorewalker Cho.flavor: Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria, but his favorite story is the one where Joey and Phoebe go on a road trip.

Void Terror.name: Void Terror
Void Terror.flavor: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

Twilight Guardian.name: Twilight Guardian
Twilight Guardian.flavor: A result of magical experiments carried out by the Black Dragonflight, it's not his fault that he's a vicious killer.

Murloc Raider.name: Murloc Raider
Murloc Raider.flavor: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

Blubber Baron.name: Blubber Baron
Blubber Baron.flavor: When oil, railroad, steel, robber, and red are all already taken, your options are limited.

Lord of the Arena.name: Lord of the Arena
Lord of the Arena.flavor: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

Sea Reaver.name: Sea Reaver
Sea Reaver.flavor: A little better than Sea Minus Reaver.

Felguard.name: Felguard
Felguard.flavor: Yes, he'll fight for you.  BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

Dunemaul Shaman.name: Dunemaul Shaman
Dunemaul Shaman.flavor: He just closes his eyes and goes for it. Raarararrrarar!

Babbling Book.name: Babbling Book
Babbling Book.flavor: His idol is the Green Hills of Stranglethorn, and he won't shut up about it.

Druid of the Fang.name: Druid of the Fang
Druid of the Fang.flavor: The Druids of the Fang live in the Wailing Caverns. They wear cool snake shirts and tell snake jokes and say "bro" a lot.

North Sea Kraken.name: North Sea Kraken
North Sea Kraken.flavor: You have no idea how tired this guy is of being released.

Vitality Totem.name: Vitality Totem
Vitality Totem.flavor: You can usually find these at the totemist's market on Saturdays.

Lost Tallstrider.name: Lost Tallstrider
Lost Tallstrider.flavor: The message, "If found, please return to Mulgore," is tattooed on his rear.

Upgraded Repair Bot.name: Upgraded Repair Bot
Upgraded Repair Bot.flavor: It's the same as the previous generation but they slapped the word "upgraded" on it to sell it for double.

Grotesque Dragonhawk.name: Grotesque Dragonhawk
Grotesque Dragonhawk.flavor: They say that "grotesque is in the eye of the beholder," but that's just because they've never seen a Grotesque Dragonhawk. Yikes!

Bane of Doom.name: Bane of Doom
Bane of Doom.flavor: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

Gadgetzan Ferryman.name: Gadgetzan Ferryman
Gadgetzan Ferryman.flavor: Is it just me, or is there something fishy about that ferryman?

Cold Blood.name: Cold Blood
Cold Blood.flavor: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"

Kvaldir Raider.name: Kvaldir Raider
Kvaldir Raider.flavor: Coming soon... to a tuskarr village near you!

Servant of Yogg-Saron.name: Servant of Yogg-Saron
Servant of Yogg-Saron.flavor: Yogg-Saron always likes to complain about how he has too many servants and there are too many mouths to feed.

Coldlight Oracle.name: Coldlight Oracle
Coldlight Oracle.flavor: They can see the future.   In that future both players draw more cards.   Spoooky.

Metaltooth Leaper.name: Metaltooth Leaper
Metaltooth Leaper.flavor: Don't leave them out in the rain. In Un'Goro Crater there is a whole colony of rust-tooth leapers.

Dragonkin Sorcerer.name: Dragonkin Sorcerer
Dragonkin Sorcerer.flavor: Dragonkin Sorcerers be all "I'm a wizard" and everyone else be all "daaaaang".

Ice Lance.name: Ice Lance
Ice Lance.flavor: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.

Seadevil Stinger.name: Seadevil Stinger
Seadevil Stinger.flavor: Pretty harmless unless you're a Seadevil.

Moonglade Portal.name: Moonglade Portal
Moonglade Portal.flavor: Ain't no party like a Moonglade party ‘cause a Moonglade party got bears.

Arcanite Reaper.name: Arcanite Reaper
Arcanite Reaper.flavor: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

Snowchugger.name: Snowchugger
Snowchugger.flavor: Do the slow chant when he waddles by: "Chug! Chug! Chug!"

Holy Nova.name: Holy Nova
Holy Nova.flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.

Flare.name: Flare
Flare.flavor: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but it's also great for parties!
