Quartermaster.name: Quartermaster
Quartermaster.flavor: His specialty? Dividing things into four pieces.

Stolen Goods.name: Stolen Goods
Stolen Goods.flavor: It fell off a kodo, I promise!

Mana Wraith.name: Mana Wraith
Mana Wraith.flavor: They come out at night to eat leftover mana crystals. "Mmmmmm," they say.

Puddlestomper.name: Puddlestomper
Puddlestomper.flavor: He pays homage to Morgl, the great murloc oracle! (Who doesn't??)

Spreading Madness.name: Spreading Madness
Spreading Madness.flavor: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.

Windspeaker.name: Windspeaker
Windspeaker.flavor: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

Silverware Golem.name: Silverware Golem
Silverware Golem.flavor: From the secret research labs of the Swiss Army.

Power Word: Glory.name: Power Word: Glory
Power Word: Glory.flavor: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding.  Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale.name: Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale
Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale.flavor: Pro tip: DO NOT BOGART THE BANANAS.

Blessing of Wisdom.name: Blessing of Wisdom
Blessing of Wisdom.flavor: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

Volcanic Potion.name: Volcanic Potion
Volcanic Potion.flavor: The secret ingredient in Kazakus's award-winning chili recipe.

Corrupted Healbot.name: Corrupted Healbot
Corrupted Healbot.flavor: Not so much "corrupted" as "has terrible aim".

Dire Wolf Alpha.name: Dire Wolf Alpha
Dire Wolf Alpha.flavor: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

Sense Demons.name: Sense Demons
Sense Demons.flavor: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.

Divine Spirit.name: Divine Spirit
Divine Spirit.flavor: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

Ravenholdt Assassin.name: Ravenholdt Assassin
Ravenholdt Assassin.flavor: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He'll take care of the rest.

Fel Orc Soulfiend.name: Fel Orc Soulfiend
Fel Orc Soulfiend.flavor: "Doc says the persistent burning sensation in my soul is probably just an ulcer."

Don Han'Cho.name: Don Han'Cho
Don Han'Cho.flavor: The brilliant mastermind of the Grimy Goons, Han sometimes thinks about ditching the idiot Cho, but that would just tear him apart.

Naga Corsair.name: Naga Corsair
Naga Corsair.flavor: Hook-tails are nice and all but she keeps getting stuck on things.

Youthful Brewmaster.name: Youthful Brewmaster
Youthful Brewmaster.flavor: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews.   Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

Primal Fusion.name: Primal Fusion
Primal Fusion.flavor: Golce and Dabbana have a new line of Earth Totems available at vendors everywhere this holiday season.

Tuskarr Totemic.name: Tuskarr Totemic
Tuskarr Totemic.flavor: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

Jade Chieftain.name: Jade Chieftain
Jade Chieftain.flavor: Seeing his Jade Golem grow up into the tall, handsome 6/6 standing before him was the proudest moment of his life.

Bluegill Warrior.name: Bluegill Warrior
Bluegill Warrior.flavor: He just wants a hug.   A sloppy... slimy... hug.

Ancient Brewmaster.name: Ancient Brewmaster
Ancient Brewmaster.flavor: Most pandaren say his brew tastes like yak.  But apparently that's a compliment.

Hex.name: Hex
Hex.flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

Fencing Coach.name: Fencing Coach
Fencing Coach.flavor: Good fencers make good neighbors, right?

Dark Peddler.name: Dark Peddler
Dark Peddler.flavor: I'm offering you a bargain here!  This amazing vacuum cleaner for your soul!

Wyrmrest Agent.name: Wyrmrest Agent
Wyrmrest Agent.flavor: Keeping tabs on the Grand Tournament is priority #1 for the five mighty Dragonflights!

Force-Tank MAX.name: Force-Tank MAX
Force-Tank MAX.flavor: There is a factory in Tanaris for crafting force-tanks, but it only ever made two, because of cost overruns.

Far Sight.name: Far Sight
Far Sight.flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

Recycle.name: Recycle
Recycle.flavor: Druidic recycling involves putting plastics in one bin and enemy minions in another bin.

Cult Sorcerer.name: Cult Sorcerer
Cult Sorcerer.flavor: No matter how many times we tell her not to, she keeps feeding C'Thun scraps under the table.

Savannah Highmane.name: Savannah Highmane
Savannah Highmane.flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

Tundra Rhino.name: Tundra Rhino
Tundra Rhino.flavor: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos.  Or am I mistaken?

Crystalweaver.name: Crystalweaver
Crystalweaver.flavor: The trick is soaking the crystals in warm milk to soften them up.

Twilight Whelp.name: Twilight Whelp
Twilight Whelp.flavor: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.

King Krush.name: King Krush
King Krush.flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

Recombobulator.name: Recombobulator
Recombobulator.flavor: For when you didn’t combobulate quite right the first time around.

Magma Rager.name: Magma Rager
Magma Rager.flavor: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

Cabalist's Tome.name: Cabalist's Tome
Cabalist's Tome.flavor: What's in there? I bet it's cookie recipes!

Ethereal Peddler.name: Ethereal Peddler
Ethereal Peddler.flavor: Yeah, sure. That Ragnaros "fell off the back of a truck".

Malkorok.name: Malkorok
Malkorok.flavor: Garrosh's best buddy. It's true. Look it up.

Micro Machine.name: Micro Machine
Micro Machine.flavor: This card is the real thing.

Captain's Parrot.name: Captain's Parrot
Captain's Parrot.flavor: Pirates and Parrots go together like Virmen and Carrots.

Southsea Squidface.name: Southsea Squidface
Southsea Squidface.flavor: Quick! Before I drown! Let me sharpen your sword for you.

Core Hound.name: Core Hound
Core Hound.flavor: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

Jade Spirit.name: Jade Spirit
Jade Spirit.flavor: "He's so cute!  I just want to squeeze him, then use him for Jade Golem parts!" - Aya Blackpaw

Pint-Size Potion.name: Pint-Size Potion
Pint-Size Potion.flavor: I hope you didn't disenchant your Shadow Word: Horror!

Eye for an Eye.name: Eye for an Eye
Eye for an Eye.flavor: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

Light of the Naaru.name: Light of the Naaru
Light of the Naaru.flavor: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

Power Word: Tentacles.name: Power Word: Tentacles
Power Word: Tentacles.flavor: Because you're wrapped in a protective layer of… tentacles?

Fan of Knives.name: Fan of Knives
Fan of Knives.flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

Purify.name: Purify
Purify.flavor: Even better than a hot shower with vigorous scrubbing!

Knife Juggler.name: Knife Juggler
Knife Juggler.flavor: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers.    They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.

Loatheb.name: Loatheb
Loatheb.flavor: Loatheb used to be a simple Bog Beast.  This is why we need stricter regulations on mining and agriculture.

Wobbling Runts.name: Wobbling Runts
Wobbling Runts.flavor: The fourth one fell off in a tragic accident.  They don't talk about it.

Mukla's Champion.name: Mukla's Champion
Mukla's Champion.flavor: An elegant gorilla, for a more civilized age.

Drain Life.name: Drain Life
Drain Life.flavor: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

Azure Drake.name: Azure Drake
Azure Drake.flavor: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

Ysera.name: Ysera
Ysera.flavor: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

Armored Warhorse.name: Armored Warhorse
Armored Warhorse.flavor: Yep.  It's a horse... wearing armor... going to war.

Dalaran Aspirant.name: Dalaran Aspirant
Dalaran Aspirant.flavor: Is he aspiring or inspiring?  Make up your mind!

Cho'gall.name: Cho'gall
Cho'gall.flavor: Even after all this time, Gul'dan still makes Cho'gall go get donuts and coffee.

Tiny Knight of Evil.name: Tiny Knight of Evil
Tiny Knight of Evil.flavor: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

Piloted Shredder.name: Piloted Shredder
Piloted Shredder.flavor: Once upon a time, only goblins piloted shredders. These days, everyone from Doomsayer to Lorewalker Cho seems to ride one.

Mark of the Lotus.name: Mark of the Lotus
Mark of the Lotus.flavor: The mark of the Lotus is a little flower drawn in permanent marker on the ankle.

Guardian of Kings.name: Guardian of Kings
Guardian of Kings.flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

Kabal Lackey.name: Kabal Lackey
Kabal Lackey.flavor: I'll tell you one thing he doesn't lack: GUMPTION.

Explosive Sheep.name: Explosive Sheep
Explosive Sheep.flavor: How is this supposed to work? Your enemies think, "Hey! Cute sheep!" and run over to cuddle it?

Twilight Summoner.name: Twilight Summoner
Twilight Summoner.flavor: If you strike him down, he shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.

Gruul.name: Gruul
Gruul.flavor: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

Rockbiter Weapon.name: Rockbiter Weapon
Rockbiter Weapon.flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

Totem Golem.name: Totem Golem
Totem Golem.flavor: What happens when you glue a buncha totems together.

Southsea Captain.name: Southsea Captain
Southsea Captain.flavor: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat.  He has hat envy.

Backstab.name: Backstab
Backstab.flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

Baron Rivendare.name: Baron Rivendare
Baron Rivendare.flavor: There used to be five Horsemen but one of them left because a job opened up in the deadmines and the benefits were better.

Arcane Giant.name: Arcane Giant
Arcane Giant.flavor: Claims to be drawn to Karazhan because of the ley lines. Actually, just loves Moroes’ cooking.

Streetwise Investigator.name: Streetwise Investigator
Streetwise Investigator.flavor: "Hmmmm…  Call it a hunch, but I'm starting to think that there may be some kind of criminal activity going on in Gadgetzan."

Public Defender.name: Public Defender
Public Defender.flavor: Happy to defend any public offender!

Abusive Sergeant.name: Abusive Sergeant
Abusive Sergeant.flavor: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

Bloodhoof Brave.name: Bloodhoof Brave
Bloodhoof Brave.flavor: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it.  He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

Shadow Word: Pain.name: Shadow Word: Pain
Shadow Word: Pain.flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

Cleave.name: Cleave
Cleave.flavor: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

Jade Blossom.name: Jade Blossom
Jade Blossom.flavor: Meditating under a jade blossom is said to grant you wisdom, unless you have a pollen allergy.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.flavor: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

Embrace the Shadow.name: Embrace the Shadow
Embrace the Shadow.flavor: For when your Auchenai Soulpriests call in sick.

Frost Elemental.name: Frost Elemental
Frost Elemental.flavor: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

Elise Starseeker.name: Elise Starseeker
Elise Starseeker.flavor: A large part of her job entails not mixing up the Map to the Golden Monkey with the Map to Monkey Island.

Shieldmaiden.name: Shieldmaiden
Shieldmaiden.flavor: She has three shieldbearers in her party to supply her with back ups when she gets low on durability.

Red Mana Wyrm.name: Red Mana Wyrm
Red Mana Wyrm.flavor: It has double the Attack.  "Go on."  And double the Health.  "Yes??"  And its trigger has twice the effect.  "WHAT???"  And it costs…  Five times more.

Faceless Summoner.name: Faceless Summoner
Faceless Summoner.flavor: They never get the recognition they deserve.

Eldritch Horror.name: Eldritch Horror
Eldritch Horror.flavor: Often wonders what path his life might have taken if he wasn't named, you know, "Eldritch Horror".

Truesilver Champion.name: Truesilver Champion
Truesilver Champion.flavor: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

Argent Squire.name: Argent Squire
Argent Squire.flavor: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath

Power Overwhelming.name: Power Overwhelming
Power Overwhelming.flavor: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It's CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don't do it.

Revenge.name: Revenge
Revenge.flavor: This is better than Arcane Explosion, so I guess warriors are finally getting revenge on mages for Mortal Strike being worse than Fireball.

Silverback Patriarch.name: Silverback Patriarch
Silverback Patriarch.flavor: He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

Genzo, the Shark.name: Genzo, the Shark
Genzo, the Shark.flavor: Infamous in the seedy underground card rooms of Gadgetzan, he got his nickname winning the coveted Shark Plushie in the city's first Hearthstone tournament.

Misdirection.name: Misdirection
Misdirection.flavor: Sometimes it's as simple as putting on a fake mustache and pointing at someone else.

Squirming Tentacle.name: Squirming Tentacle
Squirming Tentacle.flavor: Yeah, I think we can agree that killing the squirming tentacle first is a good idea.

Forbidden Ritual.name: Forbidden Ritual
Forbidden Ritual.flavor: Actually, C'Thun gives his full support for this ritual.

Seal of Light.name: Seal of Light
Seal of Light.flavor: The walrus of Light restores EIGHT Health.

Polluted Hoarder.name: Polluted Hoarder
Polluted Hoarder.flavor: Roll ‘greed’ OR THIS COULD HAPPEN TO YOU.

Tirion Fordring.name: Tirion Fordring
Tirion Fordring.flavor: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

Ice Barrier.name: Ice Barrier
Ice Barrier.flavor: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

Arcane Intellect.name: Arcane Intellect
Arcane Intellect.flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

Moonfire.name: Moonfire
Moonfire.flavor: "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

Second-Rate Bruiser.name: Second-Rate Bruiser
Second-Rate Bruiser.flavor: He'll be a first-rate bruiser once he gets used to his contacts.

Soggoth the Slitherer.name: Soggoth the Slitherer
Soggoth the Slitherer.flavor: Don't tell Soggoth, but in the future he gets totally owned by the Master's Glaive and his skull becomes a tourist attraction.

Bloodfury Potion.name: Bloodfury Potion
Bloodfury Potion.flavor: You know what really makes my blood boil? The skyrocketing price of Bloodfury potions!

Tomb Spider.name: Tomb Spider
Tomb Spider.flavor: Less serious than its cousin, the Grave Spider.

Skeram Cultist.name: Skeram Cultist
Skeram Cultist.flavor: Just before he comes into play, there is an AWESOME training montage with C'Thun.

Unstable Ghoul.name: Unstable Ghoul
Unstable Ghoul.flavor: Filling your Ghouls with Rocket Fuel is all the rage at Necromancer school.

Master Jouster.name: Master Jouster
Master Jouster.flavor: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.

Inkmaster Solia.name: Inkmaster Solia
Inkmaster Solia.flavor: Solia marks the Kabal with intricate tattoos that grant immense power. Also it makes it harder for other gangs to recruit from their numbers. BACK OFF, GOONS.

Illidan Stormrage.name: Illidan Stormrage
Illidan Stormrage.flavor: Illidan's brother, Malfurion, imprisoned him beneath Hyjal for 10,000 years.  Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.

Ancient Shieldbearer.name: Ancient Shieldbearer
Ancient Shieldbearer.flavor: Back in her day, each shield weighed two tons and she had to carry four of them on each arm!

Brann Bronzebeard.name: Brann Bronzebeard
Brann Bronzebeard.flavor: Contains 75% more fiber than his brother Magni!

Thunder Bluff Valiant.name: Thunder Bluff Valiant
Thunder Bluff Valiant.flavor: Allowing totems to attack is not cheating.  I mean, there isn't anything in the rule books about it.

Avian Watcher.name: Avian Watcher
Avian Watcher.flavor: He mostly watches light romantic comedies.

Naga Sea Witch.name: Naga Sea Witch
Naga Sea Witch.flavor: If she had studied harder, she would have been a C+ witch.

Coldarra Drake.name: Coldarra Drake
Coldarra Drake.flavor: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.

Grimy Gadgeteer.name: Grimy Gadgeteer
Grimy Gadgeteer.flavor: "You look like a Gadgetgun 3000-Mark IV man, am I right?"

Nightblade.name: Nightblade
Nightblade.flavor: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

Light's Justice.name: Light's Justice
Light's Justice.flavor: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

Summoning Portal.name: Summoning Portal
Summoning Portal.flavor: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don't get any ideas!

Razorfen Hunter.name: Razorfen Hunter
Razorfen Hunter.flavor: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once.  ONCE.

Potion of Madness.name: Potion of Madness
Potion of Madness.flavor: You'd be insane NOT to drink it!

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

Orgrimmar Aspirant.name: Orgrimmar Aspirant
Orgrimmar Aspirant.flavor: "Four out of three orcs struggle with math." - Angry Zurge

Ragnaros the Firelord.name: Ragnaros the Firelord
Ragnaros the Firelord.flavor: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord.  Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

Forgotten Torch.name: Forgotten Torch
Forgotten Torch.flavor: Why does a forgotten torch turn into a roaring torch with no provocation?  It's one of life's many mysteries.

Master Swordsmith.name: Master Swordsmith
Master Swordsmith.flavor: He's currently trying to craft a "flail-axe", but all the other swordsmiths say it can't be done.

Mind Control Tech.name: Mind Control Tech
Mind Control Tech.flavor: Mind Control technology is getting better, but that's not saying much.

Mulch.name: Mulch
Mulch.flavor: Is this a noun or a verb?  We will never know.

Death's Bite.name: Death's Bite
Death's Bite.flavor: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord

Dark Cultist.name: Dark Cultist
Dark Cultist.flavor: The Cult of the Damned has found it's best not to mention their name when recruiting new cultists.

Avenge.name: Avenge
Avenge.flavor: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force".  Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.

Earthen Ring Farseer.name: Earthen Ring Farseer
Earthen Ring Farseer.flavor: He can see really far, and he doesn't use a telescope like those filthy pirates.

Infested Tauren.name: Infested Tauren
Infested Tauren.flavor: The Overmind and the Old Gods are surprisingly similar.

Tomb Pillager.name: Tomb Pillager
Tomb Pillager.flavor: After the guild broke up, he could no longer raid the tombs.

Alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza
Alexstrasza.flavor: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

Mana Addict.name: Mana Addict
Mana Addict.flavor: She’s trying to kick the habit, but still takes some mana whenever she has a stressful day.

Stand Against Darkness.name: Stand Against Darkness
Stand Against Darkness.flavor: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

Ogre Warmaul.name: Ogre Warmaul
Ogre Warmaul.flavor: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.

Hungry Dragon.name: Hungry Dragon
Hungry Dragon.flavor: Hungry Hungry Dragon is NOT a fun game.

Deathwing.name: Deathwing
Deathwing.flavor: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

Psych-o-Tron.name: Psych-o-Tron
Psych-o-Tron.flavor: "Annoyinger-o-Tron" was just too unwieldy. And accurate.

Sabotage.name: Sabotage
Sabotage.flavor: Rogues can't stand it. They know you planned it! They are going to set you straight!

Cairne Bloodhoof.name: Cairne Bloodhoof
Cairne Bloodhoof.flavor: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It's pretty insensitive.

Scarlet Crusader.name: Scarlet Crusader
Scarlet Crusader.flavor: Never wash your whites with a Scarlet Crusader.

Leper Gnome.name: Leper Gnome
Leper Gnome.flavor: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.

Gorehowl.name: Gorehowl
Gorehowl.flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

Bolvar Fordragon.name: Bolvar Fordragon
Bolvar Fordragon.flavor: Spoiler alert: Bolvar gets melted and then sits on an ice throne and everyone forgets about him.

Flamecannon.name: Flamecannon
Flamecannon.flavor: Calling something a flamecannon really doesn't do much to distinguish it from other goblin devices.

Drakonid Crusher.name: Drakonid Crusher
Drakonid Crusher.flavor: Drakonids were created to have all the bad parts of a dragon in the form of a humanoid. But, like, why?

Sunfury Protector.name: Sunfury Protector
Sunfury Protector.flavor: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.

Frostwolf Warlord.name: Frostwolf Warlord
Frostwolf Warlord.flavor: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley.  Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

Enchanted Raven.name: Enchanted Raven
Enchanted Raven.flavor: Once upon a midnight restive, Medivh pondered, feeling festive!

Harvest Golem.name: Harvest Golem
Harvest Golem.flavor: "Overheat threshold exceeded. System failure. Wheat clog in port two. Shutting down."

Scavenging Hyena.name: Scavenging Hyena
Scavenging Hyena.flavor: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything.  Even Brussels sprouts.

Secretkeeper.name: Secretkeeper
Secretkeeper.flavor: She promises not to tell anyone about that thing you did last night with that one person.

Big-Time Racketeer.name: Big-Time Racketeer
Big-Time Racketeer.flavor: "It'd be a shame if someone disenchanted those Legendaries."

Faceless Behemoth.name: Faceless Behemoth
Faceless Behemoth.flavor: Rejected names: Forty-Foot Faceless, Big ol' No-face, Huge Creature Sans Face, Teddy.

Aya Blackpaw.name: Aya Blackpaw
Aya Blackpaw.flavor: Though young, Aya took over as the leader of Jade Lotus through her charisma and strategic acumen when her predecessor was accidentally crushed by a jade golem.

Old Murk-Eye.name: Old Murk-Eye
Old Murk-Eye.flavor: He's a legend among murlocs.  "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.

Tracking.name: Tracking
Tracking.flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

Lunar Visions.name: Lunar Visions
Lunar Visions.flavor: The true mystery of lunar visions is how there is nothing to watch when there are so many channels.

Lotus Illusionist.name: Lotus Illusionist
Lotus Illusionist.flavor: If you think her Illidan and Sylvanas cosplay is great, wait till you see her Reno Jackson!

Gnomeregan Infantry.name: Gnomeregan Infantry
Gnomeregan Infantry.flavor: The gnomes are valiant and ready to return to their irradiated, poorly ventilated homeland!

Deadly Fork.name: Deadly Fork
Deadly Fork.flavor: For a proper setting, place the deadly fork after the salad fork, but before the dinner fork.

Shield Slam.name: Shield Slam
Shield Slam.flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

Northshire Cleric.name: Northshire Cleric
Northshire Cleric.flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

Kor'kron Elite.name: Kor'kron Elite
Kor'kron Elite.flavor: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

Possessed Villager.name: Possessed Villager
Possessed Villager.flavor: It's like a pinata! A lame disgusting horrific pinata.

Feral Spirit.name: Feral Spirit
Feral Spirit.flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

Usher of Souls.name: Usher of Souls
Usher of Souls.flavor: Nothing unburdens your soul like a good ushing!

Imp Gang Boss.name: Imp Gang Boss
Imp Gang Boss.flavor: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.

Charged Hammer.name: Charged Hammer
Charged Hammer.flavor: You can only pick it up if you are worthy.

Mana Geode.name: Mana Geode
Mana Geode.flavor: Gadgetzan, where even the pet rocks have pet rocks.

Fel Cannon.name: Fel Cannon
Fel Cannon.flavor: The box says, "New and improved, with 200% more fel!"

Blade of C'Thun.name: Blade of C'Thun
Blade of C'Thun.flavor: C'Thun demands a sacrifice! Preferably a Deathwing.

Druid of the Flame.name: Druid of the Flame
Druid of the Flame.flavor: Druids who fought too long in Northrend were easily seduced by Ragnaros; a mug of hot chocolate was generally all it took.

Leatherclad Hogleader.name: Leatherclad Hogleader
Leatherclad Hogleader.flavor: The Hogchoppers, the terrors of Tanaris, can always be found at one tavern or another in Gadgetzan, refueling for totally real and legit adventures that they go on.

Majordomo Executus.name: Majordomo Executus
Majordomo Executus.flavor: You thought Executus turned you into Ragnaros, but really Ragnaros was in you the whole time.

Frost Giant.name: Frost Giant
Frost Giant.flavor: Don't ask him about the beard.  JUST DON'T.

Alley Armorsmith.name: Alley Armorsmith
Alley Armorsmith.flavor: The rent is cheap and she passes the savings onto YOU!

Shadowboxer.name: Shadowboxer
Shadowboxer.flavor: Punching is its primary function. Also, its secondary function.

Young Priestess.name: Young Priestess
Young Priestess.flavor: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

Hobart Grapplehammer.name: Hobart Grapplehammer
Hobart Grapplehammer.flavor: Grapplehammer is the horrible mind behind the Automatic Piranha Launcher (banned in 7 districts)!

Blessing of Might.name: Blessing of Might
Blessing of Might.flavor: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

Wind-up Burglebot.name: Wind-up Burglebot
Wind-up Burglebot.flavor: Don't blame the bot for his crimes...  Blame whoever keeps winding him up!

Grand Crusader.name: Grand Crusader
Grand Crusader.flavor: A veteran of a number of crusades, she is a force for light and goodness.  Her latest crusade is against goblin telemarketers.

Grimestreet Protector.name: Grimestreet Protector
Grimestreet Protector.flavor: Some new asphalt should do the trick.

Demented Frostcaller.name: Demented Frostcaller
Demented Frostcaller.flavor: He prefers that you refer to him by his nickname: 'Frostwaker.'

Blood To Ichor.name: Blood To Ichor
Blood To Ichor.flavor: For his next trick, he turns the ichor back to blood and stuffs it back in you.

Validated Doomsayer.name: Validated Doomsayer
Validated Doomsayer.flavor: Really feels good about himself and is in a much better place now. But… he sure does miss piloting those shredders.

Arcane Shot.name: Arcane Shot
Arcane Shot.flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

Shadow Sensei.name: Shadow Sensei
Shadow Sensei.flavor: He used to be Aya's tutor, but she fired him for bugging her too much.

Feugen.name: Feugen
Feugen.flavor: Feugen is sad because everyone likes Stalagg better.

Krul the Unshackled.name: Krul the Unshackled
Krul the Unshackled.flavor: Spicklefizz pondered his life choices as he looked at the chain around his neck. "Become a warlock," they said. "You get to enslave demons," they said.

Questing Adventurer.name: Questing Adventurer
Questing Adventurer.flavor: "Does anyone have some extra Boar Pelts?"

Jinyu Waterspeaker.name: Jinyu Waterspeaker
Jinyu Waterspeaker.flavor: Waterspeakers can tell the future! So the Jade Lotus employs them to speculate on the Auction House.

Princess Huhuran.name: Princess Huhuran
Princess Huhuran.flavor: She flitters around Ahn'Qiraj dreaming of the day she will meet a sweet prince, whom she can lay thousands of eggs with.

Sinister Strike.name: Sinister Strike
Sinister Strike.flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

Mistress of Pain.name: Mistress of Pain
Mistress of Pain.flavor: Her sister is the Mistress of Pane who sells windows and shower doors.

Shielded Minibot.name: Shielded Minibot
Shielded Minibot.flavor: He chooses to believe what he is programmed to believe!

Call in the Finishers.name: Call in the Finishers
Call in the Finishers.flavor: When you really need a job done… but you don't really care if it gets done right.

Smuggler's Crate.name: Smuggler's Crate
Smuggler's Crate.flavor: Are you sure these are the crates that are supposed to go to the Gadgetzan petting zoo?

Kun the Forgotten King.name: Kun the Forgotten King
Kun the Forgotten King.flavor: Aya siphons a bit of Kun's soul to animate each golem in her Jade army. To his credit, he's being a great sport about it.

Eadric the Pure.name: Eadric the Pure
Eadric the Pure.flavor: Nobody rocks a monocle like Eadric.

Repentance.name: Repentance
Repentance.flavor: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

Trade Prince Gallywix.name: Trade Prince Gallywix
Trade Prince Gallywix.flavor: Gallywix believes in supply and demand. He supplies the beatings and demands you pay up!

Mechanical Yeti.name: Mechanical Yeti
Mechanical Yeti.flavor: The yetis of Chillwind Point are a source of both inspiration and savage beatings.

Flying Machine.name: Flying Machine
Flying Machine.flavor: To operate, this contraption needs a hula doll on the dashboard. Otherwise it's just a “falling machine.”

Cobalt Guardian.name: Cobalt Guardian
Cobalt Guardian.flavor: Guardians used to be built out of Adamantium, but production got moved to Gadgetzan and Cobalt was cheap.

Tentacles for Arms.name: Tentacles for Arms
Tentacles for Arms.flavor: That's right. Garrosh just slapped you to death with a tentacle.

Wild Pyromancer.name: Wild Pyromancer
Wild Pyromancer.flavor: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

Frigid Snobold.name: Frigid Snobold
Frigid Snobold.flavor: Ironically, the natural enemy of the snobold is THE CANDLE.

Clockwork Giant.name: Clockwork Giant
Clockwork Giant.flavor: He and Mountain Giant don't get along.

Mysterious Challenger.name: Mysterious Challenger
Mysterious Challenger.flavor: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

Coghammer.name: Coghammer
Coghammer.flavor: So you ripped this out of a machine, carved some runes on it, stuck it on a handle, and now it's a weapon of great divine power? Seems legit.

Al'Akir the Windlord.name: Al'Akir the Windlord
Al'Akir the Windlord.flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

Conceal.name: Conceal
Conceal.flavor: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions.  You can't get 'em to shut up about feelings.

Bog Creeper.name: Bog Creeper
Bog Creeper.flavor: He's tried other things, but bog sidling, bog ambling, and bog trundling just aren't as effective as bog creeping.

Priest of the Feast.name: Priest of the Feast
Priest of the Feast.flavor: Now that's a world champion cheesecake!

Core Rager.name: Core Rager
Core Rager.flavor: It takes a special kind of hunter to venture deep into a firey lava pit and convince a monster who lives there to come home and be a cuddly housepet.

Healing Wave.name: Healing Wave
Healing Wave.flavor: Favored by shaman who study the art of restoration and healing, this spell would feel smug, if it had feelings.

Wee Spellstopper.name: Wee Spellstopper
Wee Spellstopper.flavor: Bane of spellcasters and spelling bees everywhere.

Yogg-Saron, Hope's End.name: Yogg-Saron, Hope's End
Yogg-Saron, Hope's End.flavor: I spell your doom... Y-O-U-R D-O-O-M!

Floating Watcher.name: Floating Watcher
Floating Watcher.flavor: "Evil Eye Watcher of Doom" was the original name, but marketing felt it was a bit too aggressive.

Injured Kvaldir.name: Injured Kvaldir
Injured Kvaldir.flavor: Don't worry.  With a little skin cream he's going to clear right up.

Flametongue Totem.name: Flametongue Totem
Flametongue Totem.flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

Twilight Geomancer.name: Twilight Geomancer
Twilight Geomancer.flavor: "Ok C'Thun, repeat after me: 'Your mother was a hamster.'"

Master of Disguise.name: Master of Disguise
Master of Disguise.flavor: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

Brass Knuckles.name: Brass Knuckles
Brass Knuckles.flavor: For the goon that wants to make a fashion statement.

Power Word: Shield.name: Power Word: Shield
Power Word: Shield.flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

Target Dummy.name: Target Dummy
Target Dummy.flavor: The engineering equivalent of a "Kick Me" sticker.

Kara Kazham!.name: Kara Kazham!
Kara Kazham!.flavor: This is what happens when you tell Khadgar to set the table.

Sen'jin Shieldmasta.name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
Sen'jin Shieldmasta.flavor: Sen'jin Villiage is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

Protect the King!.name: Protect the King!
Protect the King!.flavor: Form ranks! Everyone into the King's Tuskarr Defense!

Axe Flinger.name: Axe Flinger
Axe Flinger.flavor: Once a lowly "Stick Flinger", he's been relentless on the path to his ultimate dream: "Tauren Flinger".

Dust Devil.name: Dust Devil
Dust Devil.flavor: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

Kobold Geomancer.name: Kobold Geomancer
Kobold Geomancer.flavor: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

Stormcrack.name: Stormcrack
Stormcrack.flavor: WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE PURPLE BALL OF LIGHTNING

Blessed Champion.name: Blessed Champion
Blessed Champion.flavor: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

Mimiron's Head.name: Mimiron's Head
Mimiron's Head.flavor: Do not push the big red button!

Twilight Drake.name: Twilight Drake
Twilight Drake.flavor: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy.  And Tacos.

Ogre Magi.name: Ogre Magi
Ogre Magi.flavor: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

Wolfrider.name: Wolfrider
Wolfrider.flavor: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

Illuminator.name: Illuminator
Illuminator.flavor: "LUMOS!" is not what they yell. What do you think this is, Hogwarts?

Klaxxi Amber-Weaver.name: Klaxxi Amber-Weaver
Klaxxi Amber-Weaver.flavor: Amberweaving is a specialty course at the local trade school.

Arch-Thief Rafaam.name: Arch-Thief Rafaam
Arch-Thief Rafaam.flavor: He's very good at retrieving artifacts.  From other people's museums.

Smuggler's Run.name: Smuggler's Run
Smuggler's Run.flavor: One of the most famous busts in Gadgetzan’s history happened on Smuggler’s Run, where Sergeant Sally apprehended a cadre of Grimy Goons transporting a massive number of illegal fish heads.

On the Hunt.name: On the Hunt
On the Hunt.flavor: The mastiff giggles if you don't hit any ducks.

Swipe.name: Swipe
Swipe.flavor: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

King of Beasts.name: King of Beasts
King of Beasts.flavor: He never sleeps.  Not even in the mighty jungle.

Fossilized Devilsaur.name: Fossilized Devilsaur
Fossilized Devilsaur.flavor: This was the only job he could get after the dinosaur theme park debacle.

Duplicate.name: Duplicate
Duplicate.flavor: The one time when duping cards won't get your account banned!

Kel'Thuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad
Kel'Thuzad.flavor: Kel'Thuzad could not resist the call of the Lich King. Even when it's just a robo-call extolling the Lich King's virtues.

Tinkertown Technician.name: Tinkertown Technician
Tinkertown Technician.flavor: Won't you take me to... Tinkertown?

Confessor Paletress.name: Confessor Paletress
Confessor Paletress.flavor: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears.  Most common fear:  Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

Cursed Blade.name: Cursed Blade
Cursed Blade.flavor: The Curse is that you have to listen to "MMMBop" on repeat.

Chillwind Yeti.name: Chillwind Yeti
Chillwind Yeti.flavor: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

Raven Idol.name: Raven Idol
Raven Idol.flavor: Was petrified when it found out it didn't make the cut for Azerothian Idol.

Pilfered Power.name: Pilfered Power
Pilfered Power.flavor: The Hozen don't get paid much, but at least they get to keep any excess mana.

Iron Juggernaut.name: Iron Juggernaut
Iron Juggernaut.flavor: The Iron Juggernaut guards Orgrimmar and has just earned the "Employee of the Month" award!

N'Zoth's First Mate.name: N'Zoth's First Mate
N'Zoth's First Mate.flavor: Hates when N'Zoth yells "Ahoy Matey!!", but there's not really much he can do about it.

Soot Spewer.name: Soot Spewer
Soot Spewer.flavor: The inventor of the goblin shredder is involved in several patent disputes with the inventor of the soot spewer.

Cabal Shadow Priest.name: Cabal Shadow Priest
Cabal Shadow Priest.flavor: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

Boneguard Lieutenant.name: Boneguard Lieutenant
Boneguard Lieutenant.flavor: Underneath all that impressive armor, he's just skin and bones.  Okay, maybe just bones.

Devolve.name: Devolve
Devolve.flavor: Ragnaros looked down. He looked like some kind of War Golem. "WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME," he yelled. But all that came out was a deep grinding sound. He began to cry.

Chromaggus.name: Chromaggus
Chromaggus.flavor: Left head and right head can never agree about what to eat for dinner, so they always end up just eating ramen again.

Doomguard.name: Doomguard
Doomguard.flavor: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

Fire Elemental.name: Fire Elemental
Fire Elemental.flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

Junkbot.name: Junkbot
Junkbot.flavor: One bot's junk is another bot's AWESOME UPGRADE!

Undercity Valiant.name: Undercity Valiant
Undercity Valiant.flavor: Almost went to play for Stormwind before signing with Undercity.

Elite Tauren Chieftain.name: Elite Tauren Chieftain
Elite Tauren Chieftain.flavor: He's looking for a drummer.  The current candidates are: Novice Engineer, Sen'jin Shieldmasta', and Ragnaros the Firelord.

Thoughtsteal.name: Thoughtsteal
Thoughtsteal.flavor: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

Darnassus Aspirant.name: Darnassus Aspirant
Darnassus Aspirant.flavor: She loves mana crystals, she hates mana crystals.   So fickle!

Xaril, Poisoned Mind.name: Xaril, Poisoned Mind
Xaril, Poisoned Mind.flavor: It's basically your own fault if you go around drinking weird green potions handed out by creepy mantid dudes.

Tentacle of N'Zoth.name: Tentacle of N'Zoth
Tentacle of N'Zoth.flavor: Because EVERYDAY is the Day of the Tentacle of N'zoth.

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

Shadow Madness.name: Shadow Madness
Shadow Madness.flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

Bear Trap.name: Bear Trap
Bear Trap.flavor: You'll never guess what's in that conveniently bear-sized, bear-smelling box.

Arcane Nullifier X-21.name: Arcane Nullifier X-21
Arcane Nullifier X-21.flavor: There was some hard talk between gnome magi and engineers about inventing this mech.

Raza the Chained.name: Raza the Chained
Raza the Chained.flavor: "Could you do me a favor and get the keys from Kazakus?"

Dread Corsair.name: Dread Corsair
Dread Corsair.flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

River Crocolisk.name: River Crocolisk
River Crocolisk.flavor: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

Silvermoon Portal.name: Silvermoon Portal
Silvermoon Portal.flavor: What's Millhouse Manastorm doing in Silvermoon?

Injured Blademaster.name: Injured Blademaster
Injured Blademaster.flavor: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

Aviana.name: Aviana
Aviana.flavor: Call her "Tweety".  She'll find it real funny.  I PROMISE.

Darkshire Librarian.name: Darkshire Librarian
Darkshire Librarian.flavor: Do NOT be late with your overdue fines.

Dreadsteed.name: Dreadsteed
Dreadsteed.flavor: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament.  Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

Mekgineer Thermaplugg.name: Mekgineer Thermaplugg
Mekgineer Thermaplugg.flavor: He was obsessed with explosives until he discovered knitting. Now he yells, “SWEATERS! MORE SWEATERS!”

Hunter's Mark.name: Hunter's Mark
Hunter's Mark.flavor: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

Lightbomb.name: Lightbomb
Lightbomb.flavor: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

Dancing Swords.name: Dancing Swords
Dancing Swords.flavor: They like to dance to reggae.

Ravaging Ghoul.name: Ravaging Ghoul
Ravaging Ghoul.flavor: But goes by "Ravishing Ghoul" when he hits the club.

Alleycat.name: Alleycat
Alleycat.flavor: To be a cool cat in Gadgetzan, you gotta have bling.

Glaivezooka.name: Glaivezooka
Glaivezooka.flavor: For the times when a regular bazooka just isn't enough.

Mountain Giant.name: Mountain Giant
Mountain Giant.flavor: His mother said that he was just big boned.

Desert Camel.name: Desert Camel
Desert Camel.flavor: Dang.  This card is sweet.  Almost as sweet as Dessert Camel.

Spiteful Smith.name: Spiteful Smith
Spiteful Smith.flavor: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

Draenei Totemcarver.name: Draenei Totemcarver
Draenei Totemcarver.flavor: It's nice to find a real craftsman in this day and age of mass-produced totems.

Beneath the Grounds.name: Beneath the Grounds
Beneath the Grounds.flavor: Can you hold these eggs for just a second?  I promise they're not full of giant enraged undead spider things.

Twisting Nether.name: Twisting Nether
Twisting Nether.flavor: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

Blackwing Technician.name: Blackwing Technician
Blackwing Technician.flavor: This is who you go to when your Blackwing needs a tune up. Don't go to a cut rate Blackwing tune up shop!

Shrinkmeister.name: Shrinkmeister
Shrinkmeister.flavor: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

Powermace.name: Powermace
Powermace.flavor: People assume that shamans control the elements, but really, they have to ask them stuff and the elements are like, "Yeah ok, sure."

Mechwarper.name: Mechwarper
Mechwarper.flavor: Mechs that summon mechs? What's next? Donuts that summon donuts? Mmmmm.

Living Roots.name: Living Roots
Living Roots.flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

Crush.name: Crush
Crush.flavor: Using this card on your enemies is one of the best things in life, according to some barbarians.

Imp-losion.name: Imp-losion
Imp-losion.flavor: The shrapnel is waaaaay worse than the explosion.

Jade Swarmer.name: Jade Swarmer
Jade Swarmer.flavor: He's so good at swarming, he can swarm all by himself!

Ancient Harbinger.name: Ancient Harbinger
Ancient Harbinger.flavor: "honey, can u run down to the store and pick up some 10 cost minions? thx"

Savage Combatant.name: Savage Combatant
Savage Combatant.flavor: Maybe if you whistle a tune it will soothe him.  Yeah...  Try that.

Ancient of Blossoms.name: Ancient of Blossoms
Ancient of Blossoms.flavor: His new shampoo is really working!

Eviscerate.name: Eviscerate
Eviscerate.flavor: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent:  It takes a long time to get blood stains out of leather armor.

Demolisher.name: Demolisher
Demolisher.flavor: Laying siege isn't fun for anyone.  It's not even all that effective, now that everyone has a flying mount.

The Mistcaller.name: The Mistcaller
The Mistcaller.flavor: Calling the mist doesn't sound all that great.  "Ooooh, it is slightly damp now!"

Cyclopian Horror.name: Cyclopian Horror
Cyclopian Horror.flavor: What are the qualifications for being a 'Horror?'  Just how horrible do you have to be?

Aldor Peacekeeper.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
Aldor Peacekeeper.flavor: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

Dark Bargain.name: Dark Bargain
Dark Bargain.flavor: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

Dispatch Kodo.name: Dispatch Kodo
Dispatch Kodo.flavor: "Crime reported at First Bank of Gadgetzan.  Huge quantities of Jade being carried away by what looks like a bunch of Hozen.  Kodo 77 can you make it over there now?"

Flamestrike.name: Flamestrike
Flamestrike.flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

Grommash Hellscream.name: Grommash Hellscream
Grommash Hellscream.flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

Kidnapper.name: Kidnapper
Kidnapper.flavor: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

Wrathguard.name: Wrathguard
Wrathguard.flavor: After playing against 5 Annoy-O-Trons, any normal guard will become a Wrathguard.

Southsea Deckhand.name: Southsea Deckhand
Southsea Deckhand.flavor: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

Spiked Hogrider.name: Spiked Hogrider
Spiked Hogrider.flavor: Did you know the Hogchoppers compete every year at the Mirage Raceway?  They do.  It's a real group.

Flesheating Ghoul.name: Flesheating Ghoul
Flesheating Ghoul.flavor: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name.  It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

Young Dragonhawk.name: Young Dragonhawk
Young Dragonhawk.flavor: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

Demonwrath.name: Demonwrath
Demonwrath.flavor: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.

Crazed Alchemist.name: Crazed Alchemist
Crazed Alchemist.flavor: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.

Stormwind Champion.name: Stormwind Champion
Stormwind Champion.flavor: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

Runic Egg.name: Runic Egg
Runic Egg.flavor: Oh man! Runic omelettes are the best!

Blowgill Sniper.name: Blowgill Sniper
Blowgill Sniper.flavor: Imagine how much further his darts would go if he had lungs instead of gills!

Blessing of Kings.name: Blessing of Kings
Blessing of Kings.flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

Pompous Thespian.name: Pompous Thespian
Pompous Thespian.flavor: Alas poor Annoy-o-Tron! A fellow of infinite jest, of most excellent fancy!

Frost Nova.name: Frost Nova
Frost Nova.flavor: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

Ram Wrangler.name: Ram Wrangler
Ram Wrangler.flavor: Not getting trampled is really the trick here.

The Black Knight.name: The Black Knight
The Black Knight.flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

Varian Wrynn.name: Varian Wrynn
Varian Wrynn.flavor: Leader of the Alliance!  Father of Anduin!  Also he likes to play Arena, and he averages 12 wins.

Spawn of N'Zoth.name: Spawn of N'Zoth
Spawn of N'Zoth.flavor: Who's a cute widdle N'Zoth? You are! Yes you are! Yes you're the cutest widdle N'Zoth in the whole world!!!

Flame Imp.name: Flame Imp
Flame Imp.flavor: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

Dragon Egg.name: Dragon Egg
Dragon Egg.flavor: Think of them as bullets for your dragon gun.

Unleash the Hounds.name: Unleash the Hounds
Unleash the Hounds.flavor: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

Kabal Chemist.name: Kabal Chemist
Kabal Chemist.flavor: Sure you could have that Polymorph potion, but wouldn't you rather have this mystery potion?  It could be anything.  Even a Polymorph potion!

Iron Sensei.name: Iron Sensei
Iron Sensei.flavor:
Mechs like learning from him because he really speaks their language.
0110100001101001

Angry Chicken.name: Angry Chicken
Angry Chicken.flavor: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.

Menagerie Warden.name: Menagerie Warden
Menagerie Warden.flavor: Please? Can I keep him? I promise to clean his cage every day.

Mortal Strike.name: Mortal Strike
Mortal Strike.flavor: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

Force of Nature.name: Force of Nature
Force of Nature.flavor: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

Piranha Launcher.name: Piranha Launcher
Piranha Launcher.flavor: A great improvement over the guppy launcher.

Grimscale Oracle.name: Grimscale Oracle
Grimscale Oracle.flavor: These are the brainy murlocs.  It turns out that doesn’t mean much.

Evolve.name: Evolve
Evolve.flavor: So you say you want an evolution. Well, you know. We all want to change the board.

C'Thun's Chosen.name: C'Thun's Chosen
C'Thun's Chosen.flavor: He gave her a promise ring and everything.

Worgen Greaser.name: Worgen Greaser
Worgen Greaser.flavor: Hair products are 79% of his monthly budget.

Cobra Shot.name: Cobra Shot
Cobra Shot.flavor: "Cobra Shot" hurts way, way, way more than "Cobra Cuddle."

Shadowfiend.name: Shadowfiend
Shadowfiend.flavor: Hopes to be promoted to "Shadowfriend" someday.

Burgly Bully.name: Burgly Bully
Burgly Bully.flavor: He only burgles to pay the bills.  He is really just a bully at heart.
